story:
The Black Pullet: An Introduction

The Black Pullet ("La Poule Noire") is a nineteenth century, French, talismanic ritual book and tradition as well as an often-overlooked piece of magical history that continues to influence a large cross segment of different cultures, people and traditions. 

What We Are Contributing

In spite of its popularity, up until now the Black Pullet has only seen hastily thrown-together reprints, often riddled with typos, none of which offered any additional research or information into the book itself. This campaign is to help us publish 2 new books on the subject, which will be the gold standard of the Black Pullet tradition for decades to come. We are also offering 2 new ritual circle cloths based on descriptions in the book as well as expanded and clarified magical instructions to finally make this a workable magical system, after 2 centuries of confusion.

Why 2 Books? 

These two new books serve two different purposes.

The first of the two books is called “The Black Pullet Grimoire: Secrets of the Sage of the Pyramids,” and it is specifically designed as a manual for use in your temple. It is a small, full-color hardback book with a sewn-in bookmark. It is small in size and concise, with all of the extraneous material removed. As practicing magicians, we are well aware that large books can sometimes overtake your altar space during a working, so we designed this book with practical ritual use in mind. It has the instructions clearly laid out for each of the 20 talismans and rings, with the prayers and magical words in bold and any hand gestures or other magical instructions clearly indicated. It is also the first time that all 20 of the Black Pullet talismans will have been published in FULL COLOR. This small, hardcover, temple manual is being limited to 50 copies only (if a few more copies are needed to fill orders from this campaign, we will print those, as well, but following this fund-raising campaign, this small, full-color hardcover, temple manual will be put out-of-print).

The second book, a paperback, is called “A Modern User’s Guide to the Black Pullet,” and it contains the entire text of the Black Pullet in a new translation; however, it doesn’t just contain the text of the original book. It is the first and only book on the subject to contain an extended introduction which includes not only historical information regarding the publishing history and sources, as well as confusion over several related texts, but it also debunks several common myths and misconceptions about the original text. Also included is a lengthy section on magical instructions for performing advanced rituals of this sort; what kinds of preparations should be made; what sorts of magical tools are needed and so forth. There are also never-before-published ritual instructions for use with the Black Pullet. Regarding the ritual directions included in the book, the savvy ritualist will know how to adjust the instructions for other rituals, and as thus, it's quite an invaluable section of writing in its own regard. This book, “A Modern User’s Guide to the Black Pullet,” is being offered as an unlimited paperback, which will be available for years to come, in our hopes of it aiding future generations of magical practitioners.

How You Can Help

You can help offset our printing costs by pre-ordering either or both of these new books, as well as the 2 newly created circle cloths (based on the diagrams in the Black Pullet), which have been previously unavailable.

The first of the two circles is a 4-foot circle cloth, with a red border around the circumference. This circle is done in the classic style of a Grand Magical Circle, as seen in many of the French texts of the time. The version we are offering matches exactly the version featured in the Black Pullet.

The second of the two circles is a larger, 6-foot circle cloth, featuring a gold-colored ouroboros which hugs the circumference of the entire circle. The version we are offering matches exactly the version featured in the Black Pullet. We have smartly designed it large enough, in order to be able to put the slightly smaller 4-foot circle inside the larger one, if so desired.

We are also offering the full selection of Black Pullet rings & talismans, at a greatly reduced price, for those who may want to help further (or simply take advantage of the sale!).

Magical Ritual Tools

The Black Pullet magical tradition is a collection of 20 talisman & ring sets, each designed with a different magical goal in mind. All 20 of these are being made available at a reduced price, for the duration of this fund-raising campaign. For those who may have previously read the book, you'll know that 2 different ritual circles are mentioned in the text (along with diagrams of the circles). As mentioned above, we are also making ritual circle cloths of these 2 designs available for the first time, for any individuals who want to employee them for use, in their personal temples. 

The 20 Black Pullet Sets

This is a list of all 20 Black Pullet ring & talisman sets, which you’ll need to choose from, if you choose a perk which includes one (or more) of these sets. Each set includes one ring & talisman which were designed to be used together. We have made these items exactly to the specifications described in the Black Pullet. Each talisman is about 3.75-inches in width and embroidered on satin in their designated colors. The ring is a standard men's 11.5, made of bronzed-steel, as described in the text and contains the secret symbols (different for each ring) on the underside of the ring itself. In the photograph, they can be seen in numerical order, from left to right and top to bottom:

#1 Conjures the celestial and infernal spirits.

#2 Gives love from women.

#3 Discovers treasures.

#4 Reveals hidden secrets and lets you penetrate everywhere unseen.

#5 Will make the people tell you their secrets.

#6 Sets genii to work achieving any work desired, and to stop any which oppose you.

#7 Destroys with storms and earthquakes, but preserves friends.

#8 Gives invisibility and power of passing through walls.

#9 Transports to any part of the world without danger.

#10 Opens all locks.

#11 Remote vision and thought reading.

#12 Destroys all plans made against you.

#13 Makes you and all things virtuous.

#14 Bestows healing powers.

#15 Protects from animal and allows you to communicate with them.

#16 Gives the discernment for the good or bad intentions of any person.

#17 Gives talent in the arts and scholarly pursuits.

#18 Gives good fortune in all lotteries.

#19 Gives the power of directing all the infernal hosts against your enemies.

#20 Gives you the ability to know the plans of evil powers.

story:
Introduction

  • One man. One laptop. Thousands of ideas.
  • The somewhat simple writing does not seem that much when compared to all the technological breakthroughs that are happening every year. It will however, remain the ''purest'' form of communication, a means of expressing thoughts and emotions.
  • Connecting with people from all around the world through writing is exciting!
  • Expect brand new fantasy elements and mystery which will leave you hungering for more. 

Funding and how it will work

  • Money invested in my project will go towards paying the rent: the rent of the place where I will continue to stay to write the second half of the book. As I will be living alone, personal expenses are also included.
  • Fair pay for fair work = I am making my work available to the readers, who can review it first. They can then decide for themselves, based upon how much they like the idea, how much to invest. 
  • If overfunding happens, it will lead to a more ''polished'' version of the book and will cover the costs of the graphic perks that will be in development, while considerably increasing the chances of a trilogy!
  • No matter what the final results of the project are, I will still offer what was promised!

The Impact it will have

  • I have always enjoyed writing: It's a unique, creative experience.
  • This project is very important to me, in the sense that you readers have the possibility of shaping my future.
  • There is no such thing as too many authors! I consider that a lot of people have the ability to express their thoughts and emotions through pen and paper. If this happened more often, people would get along better.

Challenges and overcoming them

  • Writing a book is a challenge. Combining real facts with fantasy would be the best outcome, but with that also come copyright-related problems.. Taking that in consideration, I started sending out e-mails, asking for the right to use some trademarks but if I do not get a positive answer, I will have to make some changes.
  • Words and sentences might change(In a positive way). What I am creating is a work in progress!
  • Delivering something good to the reader will be the hardest challenge I have ever picked up.                                          

          CHAPTERS I+II:https://drive.google.com/open?id=1I3R9EG2ZpGIyC...

III:https://drive.google.com/open?id=1MZpd1v7eWnBTX...

IV:https://drive.google.com/open?id=1mc5fCRhlOkofu...

V:https://drive.google.com/open?id=1WZM8Q5jO4Uq3r...

VI:https://drive.google.com/open?id=1P1WuVcBFjPArb...

story:
Story of My Book


My name is Eriana James and I am the author of The 4-Year Ride. I wrote this book because there was not a blueprint for first-generation and minority students transitioning to college. This was something I struggled with in the early stages of my academic career and feel that sharing my experiences through this four year ride will be beneficial to those who come from the same background as myself and are also first generation college students.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover that you are not alone in this experience. The journey will have its ups and downs, but that is only to test your will to succeed. I want you to see this book as an opportunity to engage with the themes of; “storm before the calm”, which is dealing with adversity before everything gets better, “am I enough”, which deals with questioning one’s self worth and whether they belong in an environment; and “cheers to the mayhem“ which is the growth section of the book. It deals with realizing the lessons learned from experiencing adversity and being uncomfortable which provides proof that one is built for success.
 

The 4-Year Ride

The book is written in 3 Parts....

Part [1] “The Storm before the Calm”
This section is dealing with adversity before everything gets better. You will learn about atychiphobia, which is the fear of failure due to obstacles.

Part [2] “Am I Enough?”
This section deals with questioning one’s self worth and whether they belong in an environment where they feel as the outsider.

Part [3] “Cheers to the Mayhem"
This section is the growth chapter and deals with realizing the lessons learned with experiencing adversity and being comfortable with being uncomfortable which provides proof that one is built for success.
 

What I Need & What You'll Get


This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December, 2020.
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book is a physical copy.
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to make help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this winter.

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.


I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish

  • A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my Book and some additional sections of my manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book

About the Author


Eriana James is a first-gen college graduate from Georgetown University. She has given a TEDx Talk October 2019 discussing the experience of a first-gen and how she was able to overcome her personal battles.

THIS IS THE BOOK I WISH SOMEONE HAD GIVEN ME WHEN I BEGAN MY 4 YEAR COLLEGE JOURNEY AS A FIRST-GEN student. I made this blueprint so other first-gen students can get an idea of what to expect and therefor be even more prepared and successful in their own journey .

I am someone who is extremely ambitious, determined and a goal-getter. When I want something, I do not, under any circumstances, take no for an answer. I believe that the impossible is actually possible; it’s a matter of changing the course to make it possible.]

For more information you can connect with Eriana at erianajames@yahoo.com, Twitter: @_erianaaaaa, Instagram: @_erianaaaaa and Facebook: Eriana James-Bell.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #The4YearRide and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page
  • Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Eriana James

story:
Story of My Book

Endless: A Villain’s Love Story is a kaleidoscopic exploration of love, brokenness, and ambition.

My name is Ananya Mallik, and I am the author of Endless: A Villain’s Love Story. I wrote this book because I wanted to explore the dark side of love and passion. I wanted to take the traditional narrative and flip it on its head so that my story could explore the dangers and the untold stories of passion gone awry. The embedded narrative allows for a non-linear chronological structure, enabling the reader to delve deeper into the motivations and emotions of each character.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover the pitfalls of never pursuing your dreams. I want you to see this book as an opportunity to engage with the nuance that exists between trying to follow your dreams or just conforming to societal expectations. The book tells the story of a woman who wants nothing more than to desperately escape from her life, but she experiences trauma every time she attempts rebellion. The book follows the joys of a life driven by passion but also of the dangers of obsessive love.

Amid the honeyed air of their Italian summer romance, Alana awakens to see that the man she ran away with, Milan, has suddenly deserted her. When her rebellion for love fails spectacularly, Alana finally succumbs to her parent's wishes and buries her dream of being an artist. Many years later, she develops a relationship with her childhood friend Riaan, slowly embracing a life of caged stability. However, Alana’s suppressed desires are stirred as Milan returns and embroils her in a world of mystery, intrigue, and death. Faced with a choice between the two men, Alana’s decision may anchor her into deadly waters.

You will love this book if you enjoy thrillers, romance, or contemporary fiction.

Endless speaks to teenagers and adults who want to grapple with the quest for individuality and learning not to trust appearances in a new way.

Ultimately, I hope that Endless inspires reflection and fruitful dialogue, pressing into engaging questions like:
  • How far would you go for love?
  • Is it better to live within society’s standards if the consequences of rebellion hurt those you love?
  • Is death the ultimate form of liberation?
I look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with my readers. I believe discussing individuality and the facades we build up to conform to society will change us all for the better.
 

The Book - Endless

The book is written in 5 acts, following the structure of a traditional Greek tragedy.

Part 1 introduces the reader to Alana’s world in the present. We also meet Riaan, her childhood friend, and learn about their shared tumultuous history.

Part 2 is Bollywood in a book, through an extended flashback that delves into Alana’s love story with Milan. The reader learns how she met him on a cruise and eventually they run away to Italy together.

Part 3 builds up the intrigue and suspense as both men become active suitors in her life, but their (and her) bad choices result in a series of deaths. Alana is forced to choose, but the wrong choice might be a deadly one.

Part 4 is the outcome of Alana’s choice. As she nears her wedding day, her old flame returns to her life, begging for her again, only to have the situation escalate to tragedy.

Part 5 is the epilogue, where the true nature of each character gets exposed, questioning the definition of what it truly means to be a villain.
 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go toward the following:

The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in August 2021.

The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)

The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).

The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.

The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this summer!


When I pre-sell 120 paperback copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover and an audiobook.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Author’s Note and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.

And much more!

About the Author

Ananya Mallik is a sophomore at UNC Chapel Hill studying Business Administration and Comparative Literature. She co-founded a student-run Venture Capital fund, Lux Libertas Ventures. She also is a venture capital scout for Amazon Web Services. She describes writing the book as the perfect outlet for her creativity and one of the main ways she achieved balance as a business student. “My life currently is about numbers and projects. This book was my passion project. It’s motivated me to perform better because I was using my creative side here and was able to focus better on the more logistical problems found in my business courses.”

As a kid, Ananya Mallik would love nothing more than getting lost in a new book. Her love of reading followed her as she grew up, eventually inspiring her to double major in Comparative Literature alongside Business. Her professional pursuits center around finance and consulting, but she’s never stopped devouring books in her free time or quite able to get rid of the scraps of story ideas floating around in her head. “Eventually I decided that I just had to do it. Write the book. I mean if not now, then when?” Ananya says.

When Ananya doesn’t have her nose in a book or isn’t vigorously scribbling out drafts, she loves trying out new recipes, exploring new places, and binge-watching tv shows.

For more information, you can connect with Ananya Mallik at ananyamallikauthor@gmail.com. Her social media handles are:

Instagram: @endless.thebook
Twitter: @MallikAnanya
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/ananyamallik/
Learn more about her on her website: https://www.ananyamallik.org/
 

International Preorders

For international preorders, please send me a private message.
 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family, and network. Please use #endlessthebook and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page.

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Ananya Mallik
story_txt:
Story of My Book
Endless: A Villain’s Love Story is a kaleidoscopic exploration of love, brokenness, and ambition.My name is Ananya Mallik, and I am the author of Endless: A Villain’s Love Story. I wrote this book because I wanted to explore the dark side of love and passion. I wanted to take the traditional narrative and flip it on its head so that my story could explore the dangers and the untold stories of passion gone awry. The embedded narrative allows for a non-linear chronological structure, enabling the reader to delve deeper into the motivations and emotions of each character.My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover the pitfalls of never pursuing your dreams. I want you to see this book as an opportunity to engage with the nuance that exists between trying to follow your dreams or just conforming to societal expectations. The book tells the story of a woman who wants nothing more than to desperately escape from her life, but she experiences trauma every time she attempts rebellion. The book follows the joys of a life driven by passion but also of the dangers of obsessive love.Amid the honeyed air of their Italian summer romance, Alana awakens to see that the man she ran away with, Milan, has suddenly deserted her. When her rebellion for love fails spectacularly, Alana finally succumbs to her parent's wishes and buries her dream of being an artist. Many years later, she develops a relationship with her childhood friend Riaan, slowly embracing a life of caged stability. However, Alana’s suppressed desires are stirred as Milan returns and embroils her in a world of mystery, intrigue, and death. Faced with a choice between the two men, Alana’s decision may anchor her into deadly waters.You will love this book if you enjoy thrillers, romance, or contemporary fiction.Endless speaks to teenagers and adults who want to grapple with the quest for individuality and learning not to trust appearances in a new way.Ultimately, I hope that Endless inspires reflection and fruitful dialogue, pressing into engaging questions like:
How far would you go for love?
Is it better to live within society’s standards if the consequences of rebellion hurt those you love?
Is death the ultimate form of liberation?
 I look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with my readers. I believe discussing individuality and the facades we build up to conform to society will change us all for the better. The Book - Endless
The book is written in 5 acts, following the structure of a traditional Greek tragedy.Part 1 introduces the reader to Alana’s world in the present. We also meet Riaan, her childhood friend, and learn about their shared tumultuous history.Part 2 is Bollywood in a book, through an extended flashback that delves into Alana’s love story with Milan. The reader learns how she met him on a cruise and eventually they run away to Italy together.Part 3 builds up the intrigue and suspense as both men become active suitors in her life, but their (and her) bad choices result in a series of deaths. Alana is forced to choose, but the wrong choice might be a deadly one.Part 4 is the outcome of Alana’s choice. As she nears her wedding day, her old flame returns to her life, begging for her again, only to have the situation escalate to tragedy.Part 5 is the epilogue, where the true nature of each character gets exposed, questioning the definition of what it truly means to be a villain. What I Need & What You'll Get
This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go toward the following:
The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in August 2021.
The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this summer!
When I pre-sell 120 paperback copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover and an audiobook.I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
You will receive early access to the Author’s Note and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.
You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.

And much more!

story:
This is my Story...

My name is Mary Elizabeth, but you can call me...ME!!!

My story is a survivor's story of hope, truimph and perservance.  Come go with me as we explore the negative experiences of child abuse first-hand.  My journey takes me to a place of solitude, fear and despair. Yet, despite it all, I do a brave thing...I tell my Mom...In the end, my act of courage and bravery allows me to overcome the stain of child abuse and hopefully my voice can be the voice or catalyst for other's to speak out as well.

"No one has the right to touch my private place, No one has the right to invade my private space." 

"My Private Space" is a self-help children's book written to enlighten, encourage and empower.  As a personal eight year survivor of child abuse myself, I have endured the embarrassment and degradation of molestation first hand.  I became a victim of someone who used my innocence to silence my voice.  However, my own internal navigational system has guided me to my present place of peace and comfort. 

 

"How many others go silent, yet are screaming internally for help?"

 

Here are the Facts....

  • Adult retrospective studies show that 1 in 4 women and 1 in 6 men were sexually abused before the age of 18 (Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, 2006). This means there are more than 42 million adult survivors of child sexual abuse in the U.S. today.
  • Consequently, the American Cancer Society estimates there are more survivors of sexual abuse, (42 million) then the 12 million cancer survivors in the U.S. (Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, 2006).
  • Like rape, child molestation is one of the most underreported crimes: only 1-10% are ever disclosed.-FBI Law Enforcement Bulletin.
  • "The serial killer has the same personality characteristics as the sex offender against children"-Dr. Mace Knapp, Nevada State Prison Psychologist.
  • Nearly 70% of all reported sexual assaults, including those on adults, occur on children ages 17 and under.           (www.adultsprotectingchildren.com)
  • Approximately 20% of the victims of sexual abuse are under the age of 8. (www.adultsprotectingchildren.com)
  • Over 90% of child sex abuse cases presented to prosecutors do not go to trial. Over 1/2 are not charged or dropped after charging. (www.adultsprotectingchildren.com) 

 

Negative Consequences of Child Abuse...

  • Sexually abused children who keep it a secret or who "tell" and are not believed may be at greater risk than the general population for psychological, emotional, social and physical problems often lasting into adulthood.
  • 60% of teen-first pregnancies are preceded by experiences of molestation, rape or attempted rape.
  • 70-80% of sexual abuse victims report excessive drug/alcohol use.
  • Girls who are abused are more likely to develop eating disorders.
  • 50% of abuse victims have thoughts of suicide and 20% have attempted suicide.
  • High school drop-out rates are high among those who are abused.

 

Financial Burden....

According to the Department of Justice, the cost of one incident of child sexual abuse is approximately $14,400. (Then there are the long-term losses that impact the community, such as loss of earning potential due to poor performance in school, major health issues lasting into adulthood. Who pays these costs? You, the taxpayer! This is why we say child sexual abuse is a community issue which calls for broad community support for prevention.)
•Consider for example, the economic impact of these three North Georgia counties:

   County        Population    Immediate cost (annually)          Long-term Losses (annually)

•Hall           185,000                   $1.6 million                        $16.4 million
•Lumpkin       27,500                    $200,000                          $2.4 million
•Gwinnett     789,500                    $6.8 million                        $70 million

 

Mission, Strategies and Expectations

This is my Mission:

To put an end to the sexual abuse of children by training children and adults in how to prevent, recognize and react responsibly to child sexual abuse. 

This is my Strategy:

To introduce “My Private Space” as a self-help, self-motivating book, complete with accompanying workbook.  This initiative helps to bridge the gap between apathy and ignorance concerning sexual child abuse.  Many cases go unnoticed simply because many children do not tell. 

This is my Expectation:

My goal is to reach at least 5% of the population in each state, which will be done through the school system, local libraries, book signing events and child abuse advocacy agencies across the U.S. 

That is what we are all about--a cultural change. I want to see each State and hopefully, Worldwide, move from a place where child sexual abuse is shrouded in fear and denial, which keeps kids vulnerable, to one where preventing sexual abuse is openly discussed and there is simply no place for a molester to have freedom to assault children. 

 

Your Impact

This is how you contribution will help propel this vision into a reality.  I am in the final stages of book completion, however, in order to get the message out, I would need to have book printed and effectively marketed.  My initial appoarch is to self-publish, because this gives me the best option for creative control of the book.  See below a brief breakdown of how your contribution will best be used to bring this book into mainstream:

Print 1200 copies              $6080

Shipping Cost                   $172

Website Development        $425

Artwork/Artist commission   $500

Marketing/Media Kit           $535

ISBN                                $300

Five City Tour(includes book signing engagements and set-up)  $ 1988

Estimated Total: $10,000.00

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help spread the word to about the eradication of Child Abuse.  No child should endure the pain of child abuse alone.  Your help, gives them a voice.

Here are a few websites that you can visit to help further the cause:

  • www.adultsprotectingchildren.com
  • www.childhelp-usa.com
  • www.childabuseprevention.org
  • www.healthyfamiliesamerica.org
  • http://dfcs.dhs.georgia.gov/child-abuse-neglect
  • http://www.brightfutures4kids.org/
  • http://www.nationalchildrensalliance.org

Remember that you can share this campaign with your family and friends via social media!

As always..we will keep our contributors updated with the ongoing status of the book...!!!

story:
The Dark Night Survivors Kit


By supporting and sharing this work you may reach someone who is in distress and make a difference in their life! Your support will help get this valuable, possibly life-saving work out there for those in need.

Funds raised in excess of $8000 will go directly towards distributing The Traveler's Guide Through The Dark Night of the Soul to homeless shelters, crisis centers, libraries, churches, hospitals, and other organizations that serve those in need.

Thank you for considering The Dark Night Survivors Kit project.This is a must have for anyone experiencing a particularly difficult time. The book: The Traveler's Guide Through The Dark Night of the Soul describes and defines a Dark Night as an exceptionally dificult time designed to transform you on the deepest soul level - ultimately for your good and possibly for the good of others.

While in a Dark Night, it can be very difficult to keep your bearings. The book gives step by step instructions on how to get through this exceptionally challenging time. In the end, the book points in the direction of the other side of your Dark Night to the great possibilities in store for you.

The book is intended to support and assist individuals through a difficult journey. The Dark Night Survivors Kit adds a workbook, supportive audios (meditation and course work), the story of my three Dark Nights, and the book & audio version of Understanding and Managing Depression, a guide to understanding depression and what you can do to help yourself through an episode.

The entire Dark Night Survivors Kit consists of instant downloads:

  • Digital: The Traveler’s Guide Through The Dark Night of the Soul - $9.99

  • Digital Workbook: The Traveler’s Guide Through The Dark Night of the Soul – $12.99

  • Audio: 7 week Dark Night of the Soul intensive self-paced course - $169

  • Relax & Release Guided Meditations $9.99

  • Audio: The Traveler’s Guide Through The Dark Night of the Soul - $9.99

  • Digital: My Dark Nights of the Soul - $6.99

  • Video: Guided Tapping Routine $9.99

  • Video: The "I've Arrived" Game $6.99

  • Digital & Audio: The Pathway to Understanding and Managing Depression - $14.99

Total Value: $250.92

Your contribution will go towards production costs for completion of all of the components of The Dark Night Survivors Kit. At present the The Traveler's Guide Through The Dark Night of the Soul is available at any major book store (if they don't have it on the shelf you can ask them to order it) and on Amazon: both print and Kindle versions. Digital versions are also available at most other digital outlets. The workbook is in the final editing stages and the audios & videos are in various stages of production. Your contribution will also go towards promotion of The Dark Night Survivors Kit so that everyone who needs it will have access to it.

If you choose a funding option that includes a coaching sesson you can set and confirm your appointment at: www.lennylunden.com

If you choose an option that includes ad space at the back of the workbook please contact Lenny Lunden through the above website for further details. Your product or service must be in line with the needs of a person in distress. The purpose of this perk is to bring more resources to people in need as well as to assist those with needed services in getting word out about their services.

The funds I am seeking, and all funds raised, will go directly to pay for the services required to complete the production of The Dark Night Survivors Kit and to promote it so that everyone who needs this valuable material has access to it.

Your contribution will facilitate the completoin and distribution of a body of work that can bring relief to people who are suffering.
You can also contribute significantly by sharing this with others...by sharing this you may reach someone who is in distress and make a difference in their life! Remember to use Indiegogo share tools. Thank you for caring and sharing. And...thank you so much for your contribution to my quest to alleviate suffering.


Lenny Lynne Lunden is a Licensed Professional Counselor, Certified Hypnotherapist, Spiritual Counselor, Powerful Parenting Practitioner, Family, Play and PetTherapist, Skilled Emotional Freedom Technique “EFT” (Tapping) Practioner, Motivational Speaker, and Reverend. Lenny traversed her own Dark Nights and episodes of severe clinical depression from which she drew the insights and wisdom she shares in this book. Lenny’s mission is to serve to alleviate suffering, to empower and enlighten, and to be the living, loving light in this world she calls on you to be.

Lenny’s mission is to serve to alleviate suffering, to empower and enlighten, and to be the living, loving light in this world she calls on you to be.

story:
Like the song, Madison wants to help girls when they feel "caught in the middle". 

 

Check out Madison's Latest Blog:http://mainediscoverygirl.wordpress.com/

 

Madison was recently selected by Discovery Girls Magazine to represent Maine during a weeklong summit in the San Francisco Bay Area. Discovery Girls Magazine is an award-winning magazine that gives girls ages 8+, encouragement, and inspiration they need to navigate those difficult preteen years. Including their website, Discovery Girls Magazine reaches a readership of over 1 million.

An avid writer since kindergarden, Madison will assist with articles for upcoming issues.She is thrilled to work with 35 other girls from the rest of the country on topics such as bullying and building self confidence. 

Madison is a great representative of Maine and you will often find her outdoors biking, playing sports, canoeing or leading a playground cleanup.  She recently served on the planning board for our town’s Annual Benton Alewife Festival, is active in Hardy Girls Healthy Woman, and also authors three blogs.

Discovery Girls Magazine covers the costs of housing and food for Madison and one parent.  Unfortunately they do not cover airfare. Please help Madison and a parent get to California.

 

Check out Discovery Girls Magazine at: http://www.discoverygirls.com/

Also, read Madison's blogs: 

Ecology Blog: http://helpinghandsclubbenton.blogspot.com/

Activist Blog: http://pageantchanger.blogspot.com/

story:
Hi, I’m Marie Louise, and I want to bring you an insightful, original and ecological city guide to Paris.

Organic food, sustainability and “the green way of living” are values that more and more people care about. Not only at home, buying and cooking organic food, but also away from home, on holidays or weekends away, visiting big cities like Paris. 

            

Being a Dane, and part of one of the world’s most ecologically aware populations, I felt a need to discover this side of Paris when I moved to the city almost three years ago. It has been a beautiful way to meet many inspiring people, learn about their projects and perspectives on life – and, more than anything, discover how they manage to combine an ecologically minded spirit and lifestyle with everyday life in a big, bustling city.

                

Because Paris is so much more..

I believe that there is so much more to say about Paris than just the Eiffel Tower, Montmartre, Champs-Elysées and other well-known tourist traps. These days, Paris is becoming a Mecca for organic foodies and a source of inspiration for how to bring ecological projects into the heart of a big city. With this book, I want to share the stories of these ecologically aware Parisians and their passion for a modern and organic way of life.

I want to show you Paris’s local food communities, urban garden projects and the world’s most popular city bike system (Vélib) to the city’s organic markets, cafés and coffee places, parks and green architecture.

I truly believe that these stories ought to be told and passed on to other ecologists, organic-foodies, tourists, Paris-lovers and people who just love to be inspired.

A guide book not like the others

Hundreds of different city guides to Paris already exist, I know that. But this is not just going to be another one lost in the multitude. My idea is NOT to make a traditional and impersonal city guide: I will bring the city’s locals and organic food communities to life with authentic stories, personal portraits of people and places and a variety of photographs. All together this will make my storytelling unique and make the publication a mosaic of new voices from Paris.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

5,000 euros – Why all that money?

I’m in a favourable position as I have already found a little Danish publishing house, Arkiv for Detaljer, thats wants to publish the book. But it is a small, new publisher where everyone involved is working 100 per cent voluntarily. I therefore need to raise money on my own to carry the project forward.

As author and originator of the project, I’m responsible for all research, interviews, writing every word and taking every picture. I do all this for free. The 5,000 euros is primarily going to be used for publication and, also, I need the money to pay for a graphic designer, translation assistance, distribution and PR.

Depending on the funds collected, my wish is to publish the book in three languages, Danish, French and English, so my stories can reach a bigger audience.

I hope you will help me make this book a reality. 

Thank you so much!

//Marie Louise

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Support this project if you:

· Love Paris

· Love organic food

· Love and care for the environment

· Love good stories

· Love good portraits

· Love beautiful books

· Love beautiful photographs

· Love to give your support to an authentic, organic city guide that doesn’t look like all the others

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

About me (Marie Louise Albers):

I’m a 26-year-old Danish journalist, based in Paris for almost three years. I’m passionate about France, French people, French food and culture… everything that’s French! I’m addicted to good stories: to read them, to write them and to share them as widely as possible.

You can read my CV or contact me here:

· CV

· E-mail: marielouisealbers@gmail.com

(please find English below)

DJETINJSTVO U RATU

Finansiranje i Vaša podrška

Izradu projekta "Djetinjstvo u ratu" finansira UdruÅ¾enje URBAN u saradnji sa svojim partnerima u iznosu od preko 50%.

Ostale troškove pokušat Ä‡emo isfinansirati ovom kampanjom. U toku dvije godine napravljena su dva web sajta knjige, promotivna kampanja, obrada prikupljenih sjeÄ‡anja i dokumenata, sortiranje i ureÄ‘ivanje knjige. U posljednjoj fazi knjiga je dizajnirana, te je zapoÄet prijevod na Äetiri jezika.

Ideja ove kampanje je da osiguramo nedostajuÄ‡a sredstva za štampanje knjige.

Na ovaj naÄin unaprijed Ä‡ete rezervirati jedinstvenu knjigu (oko 350 stranica formata 21x27cm) i dobiti je na Vašu adresu. Osim toga, direktno Ä‡ete podrÅ¾ati realizaciju ovog projekta.

Pozadina

Opsada Sarajeva trajala je 1.425 dana i najduÅ¾a je u modernoj historiji ÄovjeÄanstva. Tokom opsade ubijeno je preko 11.500 graÄ‘ana, a preko 50.000 je ranjeno. Smrt je bila dio svakodnevnice. Ipak, ovo nije projekt o smrti, veÄ‡ o iskustvu preÅ¾ivjelih. Pod opsadom su trajala djetinjstva. Desetine hiljada djevojÄica i djeÄaka odraslo je u opkoljenom gradu, drugaÄije nego što se odrasta na slobodi. Ovaj projekt istraÅ¾uje njihovo iskustvo.

Koncept

'Djetinjstvo u ratu' je interaktivni projekt koji nastoji predstaviti i istraÅ¾iti kolektivno iskustvo djece Sarajeva. Putem web-stranice je upuÄ‡en otvoreni poziv ljudima koji su bili djeca tokom opsade da se ukljuÄe i pošalju svoja kratka sjeÄ‡anja u formi sms poruke. Ideja je od tih kratkih unikatnih priloga napraviti mozaik sjeÄ‡anja i tako ispriÄati priÄu tih generacija.

Realizacija

Ideju su kao svoju prihvatili i sve do danas je nose ljudi koji su dio odrastanja proveli u opkoljenom Sarajevu. Njih 1.500 javilo se sa svojim sjeÄ‡anjem iz Äak 35 drÅ¾ava svijeta za samo 3 mjeseca. I nakon toga, stotine njih aktivno uÄestvuju u realizaciji projekta razgovarajuÄ‡i, razmjenjujuÄ‡i opširnija iskustva, te dokumente (fotografije, dnevniÄke zapise, pisma, crteÅ¾e...) Ova ideja rezultirat Ä‡e knjigom – riznicom sjeÄ‡anja sarajevske djece.

SadrÅ¾aj knjige

Knjiga se sastoji iz tri dijela. Prvi dio donosi uvodne tekstove o BiH, Sarajevu, opsadi Sarajeva te o samom projektu. Drugi, glavni, dio knjige sadrÅ¾i mozaik kratkih sjeÄ‡anja primljenih u toku realizacije projekta. TreÄ‡i dio knjige je vizuelno efektan, donosi dio prikupljenih uspomena: fotografije, crteÅ¾e, dnevniÄke zapise, priÄe, pisma itd.

---

ENGLISH

WAR CHILDHOOD

Project financing and your support

Urban Association and our partners have secured more than 50% of the funds needed for project completion.

Other expenses we need to cover we will finance through this campaign. During the last two years we initiated two web-sites (one for collecting memories, another for presentation of project), a promotional campaign, editing of collected memories and documents, and sorting and editing the book. We are now in the last phase: the design of the book has been done, and translation into four languages has started.

The idea of this campaign is to secure the funds we still lack for printing the book.

In this way you will be able to reserve your copy of this unique book (about 350 pages in 21x27cm format) and you will have it delivered to your door. At the same time, you will know you have contributed to this project directly.

All backers of $25 and more will receive English edition e-book as well.

Background

The siege of Sarajevo lasted 1,425 days. It was the longest siege in the history of the modern world. More than 11,500 civilians were killed. A further 50,000 were wounded. Death was part of daily life. This is not a project about death, however. It is about the experiences of the survivors. Childhood continued under siege. Tens of thousands of young girls and boys grew up in the surrounded town. This is different from growing up free. This project explores their experiences.

The Concept

War Childhood is an interactive project. Its goal is to present and explore the collective experience of the children of Sarajevo. An open invitation was issued by web-page for people who were children under siege to send brief summaries of their memories in the form of text messages. The idea was to tell this generation's story by creating a mosaic of memories out of these short and unique attachments.

Realization

The idea was quickly embraced by people whose upbringing was spent, in part at least, under siege in Sarajevo. They have remained an integral part of the city. Some 1,500 war children now living in 35 countries round the world responded with their memories in just 3 months. Hundreds of them took an active part in the next phase of the project: talking and exchanging their wider experiences and documents (photos, diary entries, letters, drawings...). The end result will be a book – a treasury of the memories of Sarajevo's children.

Contents

The book has three parts. The first comprises introductory texts on Bosnia and Herzegovina, Sarajevo, the siege of Sarajevo, and the project. The second, main section of the book is a mosaic of the short recollections gathered during implementation of the project. The third section has a visual focus, bringing together keepsakes: photographs, drawings, diary entries, stories, letters, etc.

story:
Our Story

I started life as the son of a small hog farmer using all conventional methods - pesticides, animal confinement, fertilizers, etc. I started my work career by buying my parent's farm. I almost lost it, spent close to a decade working in the financial towers, and gradually reinvented myself as a certified organic farmer that believes organic should only be considered the starting point for lessening agriculture's impact on people and the planet. There are very few people who have walked in as many different sets of shoes as I have.

This book follows me through my journey from conventional farmer to a grass-fed beef and lamb, and pastured pork and poultry farmer that is beyond organic. With the journey as the back drop I will discuss all the major issues around our food and fibre supply:


  • Fertilizers
  • Pesticides
  • GMOs
  • IMBs
  • Fossil Fuels
  • Fossil Water
  • Antibiotics
  • Organic
  • Malthus - Feeding the World
  • Rotational Grazing


The final section of the book looks at how an average consumer can impact the food system and reshape it.


 If you want to read some excerpts from the book, visit the book's website: www.realdirt.ca. You can download a free chapter from the book on GMOs and IMBs.


If you want to learn more about the Stoddart Family Farm, please visit our website: www.stoddart.ca


The Impact

The intention in writing this book is to explain why consumers need to care about their food supply. Not from the point of view of a screaming activist but from the point of view of someone who has been on the inside and has used the conventional methods, understands their consequences and has chosen to go another route not just because of personal opinion but because there is sound research that supports his decisions.


What We Need & What You Get

As I start this campaign I have over 60,000 words written. The book is rounding into shape in terms of my effort sitting at a keyboard and writing. However to get from a 100,000 word first draft to a completed book takes some coin. There is the substantive edit, the proofing edit, the book design, and the production of the first run of books. Our plan is to self-publish both a physical book and all the major e-book formats.


I think I've created some interesting rewards for various levels of support, starting with an autographed paperback version, through limited edition hardcover versions, a unique t-shirt run, calf naming rights and a personal tour of the farm. I'm even offering up the hat I'm wearing on the cover as a single autographed reward for someone that makes a serious contribution to the project (it's a favourite hat and irreplaceable).


If the project isn't fully funded, it will go ahead anyway. It just won't happen as quickly because I will have to complete more of the technical stuff myself.

Other Ways You Can Help

This IndieGoGo project is half about the money and half about getting the word out that this book exists. I'm not going to be supported by a publisher's promotional budget. But in today's world, I think it can be done without gobs of coin. It just needs people who believe in the message of this book to spread the word. Put it out on your Twitter feeds, Facebook statuses and Google+ me. Everyone who has read portions of the book as I've been writing has given me very positive feedback on the content. It's not just opinion, not just research and not just depressing. If you care about what you eat, this book will enlighten you, entertain you, challenge you and give you hope. Please spread the word.

story:
We are living in a creative economy. It is about the survival of the most creative. Hence, the old rules of creativity that we’ve followed and admired for so long are not relevant in the new hyperconnected world. Today, we all have to be maximum creative to be on the top in our career, business or personal life. 

This book is about how creativity works, how we can make the best out of our qualities and how to unlock our creative potential in the hyperconnected world. It is a book for anyone ready to explore the unknown, think differently and pursue the impossible.

If I can reach my funding goal, I can offer get this book to the market and offer it cheaper.Your support will help me to reach a larger audience. 

Thanks for your support and spreading the word! You can read an excerpt from the book here. 

Below you will find more information about the book. 

WHY I AM DOING THIS

The single most important force that has driven humanity forward from lighting fires in caves to leaving footsteps on the moon has been creativity. Throughout history, the act of creation and the desire to make something new has laid the groundwork for everything we now take for granted, and will continue to shape our future. Whether it is the art of Jeff Koons, the business savvy of Sergey Brin, the architecture of Zaha Hadid, or Netflix’s forced evolution of online business, creativity is still the major driving force behind our progress, success, and hope for a brighter future.

My name is Can Akdeniz (You can find more about me and my books here). I believe that creative individuals are some of the most inspiring and impacting people throughout history, and I want to create and self-publish a book that will share some of the most important tenets of creativity with the world. I am asking your help make this happen.

I think it is essential for people to understand that creativity is not out of reach; you can fulfil your creative potential regardless of your socioeconomic level, cultural background, gender, educational experience, or the position you hold. History has demonstrated that creativity often arises in unlikely places, and this tradition of unexpected brilliance continues today. Unfortunately, it seems there is a growing belief that creativity is the province of gifted individuals involved in a few select fields, and that these are the only people, industries and disciplines that are capable of changing the world; this is simply not true. Although a massive focus has been placed on the development of certain technologies in recent decades, it is false to assume that creativity is not still a vibrant and essential aspect of countless other areas of life. 

The mission of the book will be to provide real-world examples of some of the most important and creative individuals alive today, as a way of demonstrating to readers that creativity and innovation are not exclusively used and owned by any type of person or industry. These are abilities that every single person can unlock in themselves, to reap rewards in their lives or their businesses. By sharing techniques for maximising creativity and lessons that can be learned from those who have done so, I hope that this book will represent a new definitive text to readers: a snapshot of creativity as it is manifested at this point in history.



WHO WILL BENEFIT

The audience of this book is a broad and diverse target group of anyone who is interested in creativity, participates in an innovative industry, or is simply looking to be inspired by the stories of genius that are happening every day. As mentioned earlier, creativity is not reserved for a specific demographic or cultural group, it is a unifying force that empowers people all around the globe. For that reason, I would expect that everyone from teenagers in rural America to aspiring CEOs could find something in this book that will appeal or apply to them. Struggling musicians, home-based business owners, and HR managers could all find gems of wisdom and insight in the pages of this proposed book, since I intend for it to be as inclusive and comprehensive as possible. When we talk about people that have been involved in the creative process, that grouping includes almost every single person on the planet, because simple problem solving and critical thinking that we do on an everyday basis has its roots in creativity and the adaptability of reality. This may sound slightly philosophical, but when our experience is stripped down to its essence, we are all active participants in the creative process, so I would hope that the potential audience that could benefit from this book would be equally universal.

EXAMPLES OF CREATIVE INDIVIDUALS

I will examine 13-16 creative individuals that have made a significant impact in recent years in their respective field, and has a unique approach to the creative process. For example, I will dissect the creative approach that Barack Obama took to politics during the first “social media election”, as well as Lee Clow’s evolution of advertising with Apple over the past few decades. In terms of the entertainment industry, I want to delve into the Coen Brother’s fascinating style of realistic filmmaking, while the blending of science and art in the culinary genius of Ferran Adria will be another of the chapters. Some of the other general topics will include product design, education, science, charity, music, and writing. 

I NEED YOUR HELP

As you can see, the scope of this book is extensive, and will require a considerable amount of time to do all of the necessary research, choose the subjects, speak to relevant industry professionals, and write the content itself. I am seeking your support to cover some of the costs that are required to tackle a project of this length and breadth. Furthermore, since I do want to make this text available to the largest possible audience, I also want to publish the book both online and in a printed copy, which will require further publication costs. Finally, online marketing to gain the necessary coverage and exposure will require additional funds. 

HERE IS WHAT YOU GET

Here's a summary of the 'perks' I am offering for different levels of support:

$10 -> Ebook: You will get the ebook version of the book

$25 -> Paperback: You will get the paperback version of the book

$100 -> Signed paperback: You will get personally signed paperback and ebook

$500 -> Your Name in the book: You will get the signed paperback, ebook and your name will be proudly placed in the Acknowledgements.

Thanks for checking out the campaign. I appreciate your support in making this project happen, and I look forward to hearing from you.

Best regards, 

Can Akdeniz

the Author of the ART OF CREATIVITY

If you'd like to find out more about me and my previous books, visit my website  or my Amazon or Goodreads pages. You can connect with me via Facebook or Twitter. 

PLEASE SPREAD THE WORD! SHARE THIS WITH YOUR FRIENDS!
story_txt:
We are living in a creative economy. It is about the survival of the most creative. Hence, the old rules of creativity that we’ve followed and admired for so long are not relevant in the new hyperconnected world. Today, we all have to be maximum creative to be on the top in our career, business or personal life. 
This book is about how creativity works, how we can make the best out of our qualities and how to unlock our creative potential in the hyperconnected world. It is a book for anyone ready to explore the unknown, think differently and pursue the impossible.

If I can reach my funding goal, I can offer get this book to the market and offer it cheaper.Your support will help me to reach a larger audience. 

Thanks for your support and spreading the word! You can read an excerpt from the book here. 
Below you will find more information about the book.

Best regards,

the Author of the ART OF CREATIVITY

story:
Who We Are   
We're Jana and Mike Llewellyn and we're starting a small publishing company called First Day Press. One day, we hope First Day Press will be the publisher behind some of the most inspired and thoughtful books and e-books you read. But first, we're bringing together the work of great writers for a project called The First Day.

What is The First Day?   
The First Day is an online magazine and quarterly print journal that uses literature, the arts, and personal stories as a way to explore faith and spirituality. We want to create a space where people from all different faiths and backgrounds can share and learn from individual experiences of struggle, despair, hope, and love. See the website at http://www.firstdaypress.org. 

Why is it important?   
Everyone has a profound spiritual life, regardless of their background, specific beliefs, or the words they use to describe it. One of the most powerful ways to explore your spirituality is to hear other people's stories of their own journeys.

Today, there are very few ways to learn about spirituality that aren't tied to a particular religion or philosophy. And there are even fewer places built for high-quality, open-minded, agenda-free writing about faith and spirituality.

The First Day is a home for great writing about all the many ways people try to find strength, beauty, and peace in themselves and in the world around them.

Is The First Day affiliated with any organized religion?   
The First Day isn't affiliated with any organized religion or ideology. It's an interfaith publication by and for people with a very diverse range of beliefs and perspectives. 

Our own perspective is rooted in a spiritual journey that brought us to Quakerism, a faith that we were attracted to in large part for its openness and respect for other traditions. As we build The First Day, we'll be guided by our belief in the Quaker testimonies of stewardship, peace, integrity, community, equality, and simplicity. 

How much is needed?   
To launch The First Day successfully, we'd like to raise $30,000. The funds will be applied to the production and operating costs of the magazine and website over the next 12 months, and will allow us to invest our time in making The First Day self-sustaining over the long term.

How will the money be used?   
Right now, our biggest expense by far is printing and postage, and will require about two thirds of our funding. The money will cover all or most of the printing and postage for the first and second issues while we continue to add advertisers and paid subscribers. 

Our next largest expense is promotion. The bulk of our promotional spending will be for online advertising, mainly on Facebook and through Google AdWords. Additional promotional expenses will include a small number of display ads, conference attendance, email marketing, etc.

Finally, we have a some technology expenses to cover: freelance web development help, additional design and publishing software, the costs of running the site (email, hosting, shopping cart software).

What happens if the goal isn't met?
For this project to succeed, it needs adequate funding, and we believe the necessary support for this project is out there. If we don't hit our funding goal, we'll keep moving forward, but we'll likely have to delay the first issue by a few weeks, scale back the page count, and reduce our promotional activity until we can try for the funding again.

What are the perks?
This magazine is all about great writing, and our perks reflect that. Depending on the level of support, you can receive subscriptions, a personalized inaugural issue, bonus digital content, poetry that's framed and signed by the author, a thank-you note on the website, or your support called out proudly in our print edition. We also have some pretty great buttons that say, "I'm quite fond of First Day Press."

Is there anything to do besides contribute to this campaign?
Sure! You can share this campaign through indiegogo's share tools. You can subscribe or advertise with us. You can get as many of your friends and family members as you can to like us on Facebook and read our online posts. You can submit your own work for review. You can talk up this campaign at work and with your friends and neighbors.

*Special thanks to Dave Tavani, a freelance photographer/videographer and also a close friend, who made this video for us. You can check out his site at http://davetavani.com/.

We are so grateful for the support of family, friends, writers and well-wishers. Your support means the world to us. Thank you!

story:
Hi y'all, it's Terra here.

A native Louisiana species, I am a proud feminist writer of Lafayette and for New Orleans, and my literary passions lie in the exploration of thematic crossroads between sexuality, hybridity, ecology, feminism, and regionalism.

In childhood, my world revolved around books-- a new title every week.
Voted "most likely to write a memoir" in high school, I aptly left Lafayette for a stranger port of harbor. I wasn't sure what, but knew I wanted to create.
As an English major in New Orleans, I realized my liberal arts future would never be lavish (the subsequent student loans confirmed it). Having lived here nearly 7 years, my love of New Orleans is the most important of my life thus far; there are no words to illuminate the ways the city has shaped my growth. 
But words are what have come of it-- a whole lot of them, growing in a community of artists, creators, individuals, weirdos, and other people like me. It's truly home. And here we are still; and 24 years later, I can say today that my whole life's work in writing (up to this point) has come to ripe fruition.

Friends & cherished folks, I'm pleased to announce the publishing of my debut chapbook and poetry collection, Last Waters.

Fast Facts about the project: 

  • Next Left Press, a local non-profit publisher, is hand-binding, building, and publishing the book, which was written about and to this elusive city over the course of 5 years, across several different countries. 

  • A fragmented narrative told in poetry, Last Waters contains over 33 poems, features cover illustration by dear friend and talented artist Audrey Lloyd, and incorporates unique structural design details such as pop-out poems, glyphs, and more. 

    Support me in publishing my debut poetry collection! Donate, pre-order, and dive into Last Waters.


    Challenges, Your Help, and The Final Impact
  • Raw materials for 200 books (published in batches of 100) are purchased, the manuscript is complete, cover art created, and first edition chapbook building is underway as we speak.
  • Our publishing deadline for releasing the first batch: Halloween weekend 2015
    ...in just two weeks. With your financial backing, the artist, publisher, and writer will be reimbursed at cost for supplies, secure the amount needed to start labor, and finally, the books can start getting assembled. 
  • We need $1,000 to get this book paid for and out in the world. So far, every step of the process has been out-of-pocket, and we can't complete this project without you. Support local art and realize the collaborative dream of three artists who want to create beautiful art objects for the world to enjoy.

    This will be treated more of a pre-order than a crowdfunder--if you support this project, you support local writers and art creation. There are perks that come with that! Get excited!
  • If we don't reach the entire goal, the creators involved can't afford to publish the book at this point, and the publication will be halted (or stopped altogether, if expenses can't be covered). Since 100% of the profits of this book goes to the artist and writer, the proliferation of great art and community-minded art appreciators will prevail!


Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't still help:

  • Reach out to folks! Get the word out and stir interest in the book! 
    Use the Indiegogo share tools! Facebook! Twitter! Go forth!

Above all, THANK YOU for being readers and supporters of the arts in all the capacities you cover. 
Whether through money or word-of-mouth, your aid is vital, because it's folks like you who inspire artists to create. 
Without you, there would be far less poetry in this world.

story:
"I am 30% through Why You're Stuck and I just have to say that this might be the most impactful book I've ever read. I cannot put it down." - Tammy - San Jose, CA


Are You Pissed Off Life Doesn't Come With An Instruction Manual?

I know how you feel. I'm just a regular guy who used to be out of shape, broke, and struggled to find answers to life's big questions.

After years of studying the world's leading experts in psychology, neuroscience, fitness, spirituality, and personal development, I applied many of their concepts in my own life.

And... nothing much happened.

At least not until I discovered a few more key insights from personal experience that tied everything together perfectly into a concise system. Since then, I've become a bestselling author, achieved financial freedom, maintained a fit body year round, and am living a life of freedom and fulfillment. 

It came through understanding and implementing what I call the "3 Keys to Freedom."

I decided to write the personal development book that I wish was handed to me from the start.  The instruction manual for life, if you will, is designed to help people achieve whatever breakthroughs they desire in their life. 

My book "Why You're Stuck" went on to become a #1 bestseller on Amazon Kindle and I received a flood of positive feedback about how much this book has impacted their lives.

Now I want to impact even more people by creating the audiobook version of Wh You're Stuck, increasing my marketing efforts, and expanding it to more ebook platforms.


"I came across your book Why You're Stuck on my new kindle. I read it
aloud to my husband each night before bed. We both loved it and plan
to read it again." - Yvonne


About Why You're Stuck


Do you find yourself struggling to figure out what you really want in life? Or do you know exactly what you want, but can't ever get it because you're trapped by fears, unwanted thoughts, and unshakeable habits?


Are you successful in certain areas, but still feel like something is missing in your relationships, finances, physical health, or overall happiness?

No matter what your challenge is, the root cause of why we get stuck in any area of life is fundamentally the same. The good news is that when you understand what's really been secretly holding you back, you'll finally have the map for how to escape.

You'll discover:

• The secret to getting answers when you're feeling lost, confused, and have no idea what to do or where to even begin.

• How to tap into your inner strength to experience more motivation, happiness, and fulfillment on demand – regardless of what’s happening in your life.

• How to get whatever you want even if you're stressed out, busy, or have a million excuses.

• What the 6 things are that drive all of your behavior and how to tap into them to reprogram any thought or habit on a neurological level.

• What the most common fear is that holds people back, and why you’ll never overcome it until you understand this one simple thing.

• Why it’s impossible to remove a bad habit, and what you must do instead.

• Why a force stronger than willpower may be your missing link to getting yourself out of any rut.

• Why much of the great advice you’ve heard, especially from self-help and personal development gurus, may be the very thing that’s keeping you stuck.

• Why looking to find your life’s purpose is almost always going to backfire on you.

• Why the truth gets you stuck more often than lies, and what the “real” truth is when it comes to you becoming a master of your life.

• How being selfish can be the best thing for you and for the rest of the world.

• Why being stuck may be exactly what you need to make your next breakthrough.

What You Get

The cost of the audiobook production is $1,350, $500 for expanded marketing, and $150 in other expenses.

In exchange for helping fund the professional audio production and expanded marketing of Why You're Stuck, you'll get:

  • $5 - Audiobook version of Why You're Stuck ($10 value)
  • $10 - Audiobook + print copy of Why You're Stuck
  • $20 - Audiobook + signed print copy of Why You're Stuck
  • $50 - All of the above + 4 Part "Stupid Simple Success" video training series
  • $100 - All of the above + 30 minute one-on-one skype coaching call

Audiobook will be available for contributors December 2014

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share the link of Facebook and tell your friends about it.
  • Any contribution no matter how big or small is welcome.

Thank you for your support!

What Happens If Not Enough Funds Are Raised?

First of all, you WILL get the audiobook (with at least a $5 contribution) as I am covering any difference out of pocket so there is zero risk. In other words, you are guaranteed to get your audiobook version of Why You're Stuck.

For those who don't contribute to the campaign, you will be able to purchase on Audible by early December at $9.99. Contributing will get you the audiobook at half price.

"Just a few short months ago, I felt lost, undervalued, and totally stuck in life! I decided it was time to make some changes, so I reached out to a friend for a little encouragement. I received a book called Why You're Stuck and it changed my mind, my attitude, and in turn helped me to change things in my life. I learned that most of the answers to our questions are already within us we just have to figure them and and let go of the excuses that keep us from recognizing the real issue at hand. From this book, I learned more about the 3 keys to success, the 6 human needs and how we as individuals can take action to make changes within ourselves. I decided it was time to put these things I learned into action and I've become aware that others in my life have taken notice, become positively influenced, and decided to take action for themselves as well. Once you push past that comfort level, you'll see the ball keeps rolling and things start changing! This book helped me to become more aware, take action, and understand the kind of actions to take!" - Christopher Cawthon
