"I am 30% through Why You're Stuck and I just have to say that this might be the most impactful book I've ever read. I cannot put it down." - Tammy - San Jose, CA

Are You Pissed Off Life Doesn't Come With An Instruction Manual?
I know how you feel. I'm just a regular guy who used to be out of shape, broke, and struggled to 
find answers to life's big questions. 
After years of studying the world's leading experts
 in psychology, neuroscience, fitness, spirituality, and personal 
development, I applied many of their concepts in my own life. 
And... 
nothing much happened.

At least not until I discovered a few more key insights from personal experience that tied 
everything together perfectly into a concise system.  Since then, I've become a 
bestselling author, achieved financial freedom, maintained a fit body year
 round, and am living a life of freedom and fulfillment. 
It came through understanding and implementing what I call the "3 Keys to Freedom."
I decided to write the personal development book that I wish was handed to me from the start.  The instruction manual for 
life, if you will, is designed to help people achieve whatever breakthroughs they desire in their life. 
My book "Why You're Stuck" went on to become a #1 bestseller on Amazon Kindle and I received a flood of positive feedback about how much this book has impacted their lives.

Now I want to impact even more people by creating the audiobook version of Wh You're Stuck, increasing my marketing efforts, and expanding it to more ebook platforms.

"I came across your book Why You're Stuck on my new kindle. I read italoud to my husband each night before bed. We both loved it and planto read it again." - Yvonne

About Why You're Stuck


Do you find yourself struggling to figure out what you really want in 
life?  Or do you know exactly what you want, but can't ever get it 
because you're trapped by fears, unwanted thoughts, and unshakeable 
habits?

Are you successful in certain areas, but still feel like something 
is missing in your relationships, finances, physical health, or overall 
happiness?

No matter what your challenge is, the root cause of why we get stuck
 in any area of life is fundamentally the same.  The good news is that 
when you understand what's really been secretly holding you back, you'll
 finally have the map for how to escape.  


You'll discover:• The secret to getting answers when you're feeling lost, confused, and have no idea what to do or where to even begin.

• How to tap into your inner strength to experience more motivation, happiness, and fulfillment on demand – regardless of what’s happening in your life.

• How to get whatever you want even if you're stressed out, busy, or have a million excuses.

• What the 6 things are that drive all of your behavior and how to 
tap into them to reprogram any thought or habit on a neurological level.

• What the most common fear is that holds people back, and why you’ll never overcome it until you understand this one simple thing.

• Why it’s impossible to remove a bad habit, and what you must do instead.

• Why a force stronger than willpower may be your missing link to getting yourself out of any rut.

• Why much of the great advice you’ve heard, especially from 
self-help and personal development gurus, may be the very thing that’s 
keeping you stuck.

• Why looking to find your life’s purpose is almost always going to backfire on you.

• Why the truth gets you stuck more often than lies, and what the 
“real” truth is when it comes to you becoming a master of your life.

• How being selfish can be the best thing for you and for the rest of the world.

• Why being stuck may be exactly what you need to make your next breakthrough.

  What You Get

The cost of the audiobook production is $1,350, $500 for expanded marketing, and $150 in other expenses. 
In exchange for helping fund the professional audio production and expanded marketing of Why You're Stuck, you'll get:  $5 - Audiobook version of Why You're Stuck ($10 value)
 $10 - Audiobook + print copy of Why You're Stuck
 $20 - Audiobook + signed print copy of Why You're Stuck
$50 - All of the above + 4 Part "Stupid Simple Success" video training series
$100 - All of the above + 30 minute one-on-one skype coaching call

Audiobook will be available for contributors December 2014
   Other Ways You Can Help  Share the link of Facebook and tell your friends about it.
 Any contribution no matter how big or small is welcome.
   Thank you for your support!What Happens If Not Enough Funds Are Raised?First of all, you WILL get the audiobook (with at least a $5 contribution) as I am covering any difference out of pocket so there is zero risk. In other words, you are guaranteed to get your audiobook version of Why You're Stuck.For those who don't contribute to the campaign, you will be able to purchase on Audible by early December at $9.99. Contributing will get you the audiobook at half price."Just a few short months ago, I felt lost, undervalued, and totally stuck
 in life! I decided it was time to make some changes, so I reached out 
to a friend for a little encouragement. I received a book called Why 
You're Stuck and it changed my mind, my attitude, and in turn helped me 
to change things in my life. I learned that most of the answers to our 
questions are already within us we just have to figure them and and let 
go of the excuses that keep us from recognizing the real issue at hand. 
From this book, I learned more about the 3 keys to success, the 6 human 
needs and how we as individuals can take action to make changes within 
ourselves. I decided it was time to put these things I learned into 
action and I've become aware that others in my life have taken notice, 
become positively influenced, and decided to take action for themselves 
as well. Once you push past that comfort level, you'll see the ball 
keeps rolling and things start changing! This book helped me to become 
more aware, take action, and understand the kind of actions to take!" - Christopher Cawthon

story:
Prior to this year, I've never been big in participating in this event or any events like this. Highly promoted obstacles courses, always seemed ingenue. Simply put, they came across as an artificial way to boost ones ego, or brag to friends on the "hardship" they endured. This didn't really appeal to me. That was until I read the Tough Mudder Philopshy.

A few months back, I stumlbed upon some videos for past events and I was quite surpised at what I saw. I did not see huge buff compeitors sprinting past each obstacles. I did not see people attempting to finish the course in the best time possible. I did not even see participants pushing and trampling over one another to get to the finished line, like expected.  Instead, I noticed average people helping each other and having fun while doing so. 

Researching the event more, I discovered that Tough Mudder is not meant to be an event to complete as an individual. Rather it is an event to be completed as a group, where freinds, family and strangers come together and help each other. In addition to the personal accomplishment that the event brings, Tough Mudder also supports The Wounded Warriors Foundation. Wounded Warriors Canada is a non-profit organization that helps Canadian Forces members who have been wounded or injured in their service to Canada. These are the men and woman that have fought for us, and the freedom we enjoy on a daily basis. By supporting our team at Tough Mudder 2014, you are making a statement that you support the sacrifices of these men and women. 

What are donations for? Donations will go towards the Wounded Warriors Fund.  Supporting our team will show that you not only support these Canadian War Veterans, but also take a stand towards overcoming obstacles and self doubt in all avenues of life. Support our team, and let's show veterans that their sacrifice has not been forgotten.

story:
I'll be a second year Burner in 2012.  In my first year, I was amazed by incredible visual art and sound camps on the playa, but as a writer, I missed my own art form, literature.  This year, KEROSENE is bringing the work of 47 writers to the playa as a print magazine and burnable billbaord that are simultaneously turning into more and more interesting visual art as we work through the details.    

This is a highly collaborative project!  First and foremost, people offered their writing.     Originally, I had planned to curate the magazine and pick "the best" pieces.  In the end, I saw that the pieces illuminate one another in interesting ways and decided to turn my planned 10-page magazine into a 60-page, fully inclusive literary offering.  This means raising a lot more money than originally planned and that's where you come in.

People have offered much more than just their writing.  They've helped me plan the burnable billboard--designing it, building it, shipping it, lighting it, powering it and burning it.  They've offered help in erecting it once we're on the playa, designing the print magazine, getting the website live, and keeping this project going.  Most of these people were strangers before KEROSENE brought us together.  The collaborative nature of all this has been deeply fun and extremely moving.  Thanks to all of you!

Along the way, one of the writers offered to bring the magazines and her own version of the burnable billbaord to Burn in the Firest, the Vancouver regional Burning Man event.  Thanks to the wonderful Kimpossible!  Additional funding raised here will be offered to Kimpossible for the Vancouver KEROSENE--printing and billboard.

Funding for this project will cover:

--printing of magazines (about $5 per copy--thanks to Kimpossible for finding a cheap printer!)  $750-$1,350

--building materials and stuff to secure the billboard against wind (thanks to Frankie and Ty for essential help in planning)  $200

--lighting and powering the lights (an additional $200 if we go solar!--thanks to Mike and Pieter for planning) $325-$525

--transportation of billboard and magazines (thanks to the NY Container Crew)  $200

--Burn and clean up materials (fire extinguishers, rakes, etc)   $70

--Stuff I forget that I'll realize I need to fund later  $55

--Indegogo fees and shipping of reqards to generous funders like you  $300

IF YOU FUND US, you can choose from among yummy perks.  EVEN IF YOU CAN'T FUND US, please pass the word out.  Post news of this campaign on your Burning Man regional list and send it out to your friends.  You can really help us that way.  And come visit the billboard if you make it to the playa!  We'll be having a party there, probably on Tuesday evening at sundown (placement of the billboard is still unclear, we'll do our best to publicize this later)  And come watch us burn our writing (time to be determined)!

story:
Si has llegado hasta aquí lo más probable es que te haya gustado nuestra idea, seas un amante de los animales, o mejor aún, ambas. Por lo tanto y al igual que nosotros habrás intentado (infinidad de veces) captar uno de esos momentos especiales junto a tu mascota sin mucho éxito ¿Verdad? Es más probable que tu peludo salga corriendo, mire a otro lugar o se las ingenie para liarte una buena.

Este es el reto que tres amigos se propusieron solucionar, y así es como surgió PetSelfie.

PetSelfie es un dispositivo que se acopla a tu Smartphone o Tablet y, que de una manera sencilla y divertida, es capaz de captar el foco natural de atención de tu mascota permitiéndote inmortalizar esos momentos únicos junto a ella.






¡MUCHAS GRACIAS!

story:
Story of My Book

The CEOs of Networking is about how building connections and networking can jump start your career. It explains how to take the “work” out of networking.

My name is HRHeidi Torres and I am the author of The CEOs of Networking. I wrote this book because my colleagues and former classmates often shared their distress of not knowing how to network or where to find business connections. I want to help as many people as possible have better relationships that will help advance their career goals.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover the power of connecting and interacting through networking. I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for this process. Ultimately, I want you to view this book as a tool to help you connect and build relationships without having it feel like work.

In this book, you'll learn how to start conversations that lead to deeper connections and how even introverts can successfully grow their networks. You'll hear stories such as...

  • How volunteering to help others can lead to opportunities for career growth.
  • When networking literally saved someone’s life.
  • What scavenger hunting and networking have in common.

You will love this book if you are an introvert and nervous about networking, looking for new career opportunities, or want to learn how to connect and build trusted relationships.

The CEOs of Networking is a nonfiction book that speaks to recent college graduates joining the workforce and people changing careers who want to look at how to optimize social media and networking in a new way.

The Book - The CEOs of Networking

The book is written in 3 parts.

Part 1 contains the introduction + chapters 1 - 5. This section shows the evolution of networking and why the pandemic changed the way people connect with each other. Humans are not made for sustained isolation, it can lead to self-loathing and low self-esteem. The coronavirus pandemic forced Americans to shelter in place forcing us to change the way we network.

Part 2 contains chapters 6 - 13. Part 2 shares the principles of networking. This section shares the different layers of networking and how each layer builds upon each other.

Part 3 contains chapters 14 - 16. In Part 3, the reader will learn how introverts and job seekers can leverage networking into new career opportunities.

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in August, 2021.
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this summer.


When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and eBook.

When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition.

When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more!

About the Author

HRHeidi Torres is a Human Resource Professional with HerrinHR that helps business owners achieve their strategic goals through customized and proactive HR programs. Her father used to say he was proud that Heidi never shied away from doing what needed to be done whether it was leading an organization or finding ways to help others succeed.

College graduates struggle to find work in their chosen field of study. Millions of people lost their job during the coronavirus pandemic making networking more important than years past. HRHeidi wrote this book to help people connect and grow their network in the age of social distancing and self-quarantines. She is also passionate about helping businesses develop a more diverse and inclusive environment.

In her “spare” time, HRHeidi volunteers for the Alzheimer’s Association “Walk to End Alzheimer’s.” She is a foodie with a weakness for breakfast tacos and a mother to two rescue (now spoiled) cats and two large ducks. In high school, her nickname was Hyper Heidi. As an adult, she focused that energy into being HRHeidi.

For more information, you can connect with HRHeidi at ceoofnetworking@hrheidi.com and at LinkedIN @HRHeidi-Torres, Twitter @Htorres37, Instagram @HRHeidiTorres, Facebook @HRheidi.torres, YouTube @UCuA3M4N2p-nTF-pC5uGUZug and Website HRHeidi.com.

International Preorders

For international preorders, please send me a private message.
 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #theceosofnetworking, #HRHeidi, and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so that we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my pre-sale campaign via Indiegogo at the top of the page.

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
HRHeidi Torres

story:
Real Estate Success Strategies: What They Forgot to Teach You in School is about my journey into real estate investing and becoming a millionaire while serving active duty Air Force. Additionally, I captured the stories of other successful real estate investors I know and how they found success in their lives!

My name is Johnny Lynum and I am the author of Real Estate Success Strategies: What They Forgot to Teach You in School. I wrote this book because I followed the suggested routine of getting good grades, going to college, and getting a good job. However, after succeeding, I still lacked the necessary financial literacy to invest and to build long-term wealth.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover the traits and habits of successful people, along with real estate investing strategies you can begin implementing immediately. I aim to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have found in real estate investing and finding success. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you continue or start building generational wealth for you and your family!

In this book, you'll learn about habits/traits of successful people and their real estate investing experiences. You'll hear stories such as...
 

Dave Seymour, and how he immigrated to the US at the age of 19 from an impoverished inner city neighborhood in London, England. After moving to the US and eventually becoming a fire fighter and working other odd jobs during the week, with some weeks, working 120 hours in order to provide for his family! However, Dave never gave up and eventually went on to host multiple seasons of A&E's hit TV show, Flipping Boston and starting a $100M private equity fund!

 

I share my story of how my wife and I purchased our first fix-n-flip project in Alexandria, VA. I share the challenges in finding the right property, securing financing and the due diligence required to ensure the deal would be profitable. Additionally, I talk about the mindset behind the decision to move forward with the project despite facing some uncertainty and unknown challenges after closing.

 

Another great story is the story of Vinney Chipora and how he came to the United States with only $7 to his name! Vinney came to the US to obtain a Master's degree and took a job in the summertime going door to door selling books back in the late 1970s. Afterwards, he went on to take a job opportunity in San Francisco as a promotional consultant and began his real estate career investing in single family and multifamily properties. Today, Vinney has been a key principal in the acquisition of over 4,500 apartment units across 34 multifamily syndications in the last 10+ years.


You will love this book if you are interested in learning strategies to become a successful real estate investor, have interest in becoming an entrepreneur, or interested in learning about the habits other successful entrepreneurs have used to find success!

Real Estate Success Strategies is a nonfiction book that speaks to new real estate investors and intermediate real estate investors who want to look at the psychology behind success and in a new way.
 

 

The Book - Real Estate Success Strategies


The book is written in 3 parts.

Part 1 contains the introduction + chapters 1-3. Part 1 is dedicated to fully understanding the current state of financial literacy in America and analyzing today's millionaire and their source of wealth. Nearly 90% of all millionaires today are 1st generation millionaires and didn't inherit their wealth. Additionally, we look at the law of the first deal and how it can catapult your investing journey. After successfully buying their first deal, the majority of investors build momentum and repeat success soon thereafter.

Part 2 contains chapters 4-7. Part 2 is dedicated to habits and soft skills needed to become successful in real estate and life in general. We discuss grit and the importance of taking action with detailed stories of how other investors leveraged these traits on their path to achieving success. Also, we cover the importance of networking and aligning with other like-minded individuals in order accomplish your goals.

Part 3 contains chapters 8- 12. Part 3 is dedicated to real estate investing strategies and stories of how normal everyday investors have leveraged them to build generational wealth. We discuss how to finance real estate deals, single family home investing, the wholesaling strategy, the fix-n-flip strategy, and apartment investing. There are many different niches in the real estate asset class and we walk through the primary asset vehicles and give you detailed information you can implement in your own personal investing strategy.

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

 

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December 2021.
  • The Cover Design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The Copyediting for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this Winter 2021.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish and a handwritten thank-you note.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”).
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and some excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • You will be invited to attend an exclusive real estate investing webinar hosted by myself.
  • And few more perks as we get closer to the book launch!


Campaign Goals

  • Tier 1: Hit $5,500 and the ebook/softcover editions get published (this is the minimum needed)
  • Tier 2: Hit $6,500 and the book will get a hardcover edition
  • Tier 3: Hit $8,500 and we’ll get an audiobook edition.

 

About the Author

 

Johnny Lynum is an active duty United States Air Force Lieutenant Colonel, seasoned real estate investor, and entrepreneur. He started his real estate investing career in 2010 and has extensive experience in project management, operations, marketing, and negotiations. Over the last six years, Johnny has purchased and sold over two dozen single family properties and one apartment across four different markets. He holds a Masters Degree in Business Administration from TUI University, Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering from The University of Alabama, and Financial Planning and Services Certification from Northwestern University.

Born in Detroit, MI, Johnny Lynum is a genuine, servant leader who strives to make a positive impact wherever he goes. He grew up in Whatley, AL with his parents Johnnie and Ruth Lynum and his sister Johnnetta. Johnny has always excelled at whatever he does whether in the class room, on the basketball court, or managing a $1.2 Billion software development program.

He wrote this book to assist others who didn't receive the financial knowledge at home or in school to build generational wealth. Johnny believes we all start from different positions in life, but we all have the ability to be successful if we have the right strategy. What he loves most about real estate is the ability to create passive income to buy back your time instead of having to constantly work for money.

Johnny has a beautiful wife and three kids who he loves to spend time with when not working. They love to travel and experience new areas and new cultures. Additionally, he likes to mentor youth and partner with organizations like BUY-COBB in Atlanta and teach some of the same concepts we cover in my book to help give our youth a head start in life.

For more information, you can connect with Johnny Lynum at www.johnnylynum.com, LinkedIn Johnny Lynum, Instagram @mroperationrestore, and in the DC, MD, VA (DMV) Multifamily Real Estate Facebook Community.

 

International Preorders

 

For international preorders, please DM me for information!

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone can support, but that doesn't mean you can't get something out of it!
I will reward the top 3 people who refer the most backers at the end of the campaign (30 days). Here's how:

At the top of the campaign page, you will see the "share" buttons. Click on the "chain" icon to get a custom link just for you. (Note: don't use the URL in the browser window as it won't work to track referrals and you won't get credit.)

Copy that link and paste it on your social media, email it to a friend, or text a fellow book lover.

When someone clicks on that link and backs the book, you get 1 entry!

Please use #Realestatesuccessstrategies and #RESS and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts!
Tag:
Instragram - @mroperationrestore / @newdegreepress
Facebook -  @johnnyjlynum/ @NewDegreePress
LinkedIn - @johnnylynum / @NewDegreePress

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Johnny Lynum
story_txt:
Real Estate Success Strategies: What They Forgot to Teach You in School is about my journey into real estate investing and becoming a millionaire while serving active duty Air Force. Additionally, I captured the stories of other successful real estate investors I know and how they found success in their lives!My name is Johnny Lynum and I am the author of Real Estate Success Strategies: What They Forgot to Teach You in School. I wrote this book because I followed the suggested routine of getting good grades, going to college, and getting a good job. However, after succeeding, I still lacked the necessary financial literacy to invest and to build long-term wealth.My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover the traits and habits of successful people, along with real estate investing strategies you can begin implementing immediately. I aim to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have found in real estate investing and finding success. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you continue or start building generational wealth for you and your family!In this book, you'll learn about habits/traits of successful people and their real estate investing experiences. You'll hear stories such as... 
Dave Seymour, and how he immigrated to the US at the age of 19 from an impoverished inner city neighborhood in London, England. After moving to the US and eventually becoming a fire fighter and working other odd jobs during the week, with some weeks, working 120 hours in order to provide for his family! However, Dave never gave up and eventually went on to host multiple seasons of A&E's hit TV show, Flipping Boston and starting a $100M private equity fund! I share my story of how my wife and I purchased our first fix-n-flip project in Alexandria, VA. I share the challenges in finding the right property, securing financing and the due diligence required to ensure the deal would be profitable. Additionally, I talk about the mindset behind the decision to move forward with the project despite facing some uncertainty and unknown challenges after closing. Another great story is the story of Vinney Chipora and how he came to the United States with only $7 to his name! Vinney came to the US to obtain a Master's degree and took a job in the summertime going door to door selling books back in the late 1970s. Afterwards, he went on to take a job opportunity in San Francisco as a promotional consultant and began his real estate career investing in single family and multifamily properties. Today, Vinney has been a key principal in the acquisition of over 4,500 apartment units across 34 multifamily syndications in the last 10+ years.
You will love this book if you are interested in learning strategies to become a successful real estate investor, have interest in becoming an entrepreneur, or interested in learning about the habits other successful entrepreneurs have used to find success!Real Estate Success Strategies is a nonfiction book that speaks to new real estate investors and intermediate real estate investors who want to look at the psychology behind success and in a new way.  The Book - Real Estate Success Strategies
The book is written in 3 parts.Part 1 contains the introduction + chapters 1-3. Part 1 is dedicated to fully understanding the current state of financial literacy in America and analyzing today's millionaire and their source of wealth. Nearly 90% of all millionaires today are 1st generation millionaires and didn't inherit their wealth. Additionally, we look at the law of the first deal and how it can catapult your investing journey. After successfully buying their first deal, the majority of investors build momentum and repeat success soon thereafter.Part 2 contains chapters 4-7. Part 2 is dedicated to habits and soft skills needed to become successful in real estate and life in general. We discuss grit and the importance of taking action with detailed stories of how other investors leveraged these traits on their path to achieving success. Also, we cover the importance of networking and aligning with other like-minded individuals in order accomplish your goals.Part 3 contains chapters 8- 12. Part 3 is dedicated to real estate investing strategies and stories of how normal everyday investors have leveraged them to build generational wealth. We discuss how to finance real estate deals, single family home investing, the wholesaling strategy, the fix-n-flip strategy, and apartment investing. There are many different niches in the real estate asset class and we walk through the primary asset vehicles and give you detailed information you can implement in your own personal investing strategy. What I Need & What You'll Get
 
This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December 2021.
The Cover Design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
The Layout Design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
The Copyediting for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this Winter 2021.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish and a handwritten thank-you note.
Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”).

story:
Story of My Book

The Curious Business Owner is a book that examines some of the most common reasons small businesses fail and how using a sense of curiosity can help to build up ones financial confidence. Financial confidence is crucial for business owners to make effective financial decisions, yet only 25% of businesses in the world accurately keep track of and record their financial data. 

My name is Chris Arredondo and I am the author of The Curious Business Owner. I wrote this book to help business owners overcome the obstacles in business by being more aware of how important financial management is to making more mindful decisions and maximizing the performance of the business. In my research I found that using a curious mindset is key to building financial success. When we use our curiosity we develop an interest in our social and psychological capital and by capturing the right financial data we can make better financial decisions. 

I’ve learned about many of the obstacles that small business owners face throughout my career and my relationships with business owners. I have seen how many times obstacles are created internally and unfortunately the struggles increase over the life of the business causing a downward spiral. I continuously encountered business owners that had capped off their willingness to expand their business mindset because they feel that revenue will fix all their problems. We get told to hustle harder but it is the business owners that incorporate innovation, development, and a continued motivation of learning new ways of doing things that create a better foundation for success.  

As financial problems become the main cause of business failure, the solution of the problem gets ignored by the stress of the situation. Financial management is recognized as the leading objective for business growth and development yet entrepreneurs continue to ignore the significance their financial performance plays in their long term success.

I will demonstrate how curiosity can help develop the most important aspect of a business, capital. Most people’s attention is on Financial Capital, since it is the leading cause of business failure, but I will make the argument that curiosity builds financial stability through a focus on:

  • Human Capital - creating an environment that encourages an exchange of ideas through communication. 
  • Social Capital - creating a network of people that hold us accountable.
  • Data Capital - creating processes that capture as much information as possible about the business, to make informed decisions.

Psychological Capital - creating an understanding of who we are as a leader of an organization.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will gain an interest in how curiosity creates a grounded confidence that helps us improve decision making and our daily habits. In this book, I hope to instill in you the same passion and excitement that I have in learning from others. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to become a better problem solver, overcome fears, develop empathy, and become more knowledgable and self-aware as a business owner. 

In this book, you'll learn how to overcome the common failures small business owners face and how the habit of a curious mindset can help develop innovation and stability in our businesses. You'll hear stories such as...

  • How Warren Buffet used his curiosity to become one of the wealthiest persons in the world. 
  • How curiosity develops the emotional intelligence we need to create stability in our lives. 
  • How we have been mislead in thinking that financial access is the only solution in having a successful business. 

You will love this book if you would like self-development you are a business owner looking to maximize performance. 

The Curious Business Owner is a nonfiction book that speaks to business owners who want to look at financial success and mental development in a new way. 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in April, 2021.
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this Spring.

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.


I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.

  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more!

About the Author
Chris Arredondo is Co-Founder and CEO of AXIOM Capital Partners, which was founded to give small businesses access to the money they need to grow. With 15-years of experience in finance, accounting, and consulting his mission is to simplify the connection between businesses and funding.

As a first-time author, Chris’ upcoming book titled The Case for the Curious Business Owner dated to be released in the Spring of 2021, reflects his passion to help business owners. The book provides a wealth of information and understanding of the habits, techniques, and tools needed to create a better financial position for businesses.  

As CEO of AXIOM, Chris’ main concentration is the continued development of financial tools that connect businesses to the support they need to be successful.

Outside of his passion for business, Chris enjoys spending time with his wife and three children, trying new recipes in the kitchen, getting caught up in video games with his sons, and enjoying the West Texas weather while doing yard work. 

For more information, you can connect with Chris Arredondo at chrisa@axiompartners.capital and at

  • @axcap_chrisa on Instagram
  • facebook.com/chris.arredondo.AXCAP on Facebook 
  • linkedin.com/in/arredondochris on LinkedIn       

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier. 

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please share my pre-sale campaign on Instagram, Facebook, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #Curiousbusinessowner and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so that we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my pre-sale campaign via Indiegogo at the top of the page.

  • Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,

Chris Arredondo

story:
STEP STORIES

My future step-son loves his parents, all four of us! There are so many kinds of families these days and all of them deserve to be represented in children's literature. I want to create books that fit a huge variety of family types. Children deserve to see the beauty of their own family and of the families of others in the beloved characters of the books that they will treasure their whole lives.

What We Need & What You Get

We need $3,200 to make this book happen!

  • In order to self-publish, I will be using $1000 to purchase a print-on-demand contract with BookBaby Publishing that also includes an ISBN number, metadata, and distribution with BookBaby, Amazon, Barnes and Noble. and many more.

  • Another $850 will be going toward advertising with facebook and instagram.

  • And the remaining amount is to help get the first 60 contributors of $35 or more copies of Tall Bear, book 1 in the Step Stories series.   

The Impact

Tall Bear has not only shown my future step-son a family like his, with two moms and two dads, but it's brought the four of us parents together and reminded us of the most important thing, which is to make our Judah Bear feel loved. I want every family member, no matter how they are related, to find a book in my series that resembles their family dynamic and be able to share it with their little one. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Share please! Share the link to this page so that others can contribute as well!

I would also love to hear your family story. The more family types I hear from the more specific my books can be. I'd love to know how the child in your world came into your life and what you want them to know about you as their guardian. Email me at step.stories.info@gmail.com

story:
Ilana's Israel/Palestine Memoir

Book Premise:

Two years after I moved to Israel, I became the Jerusalem director of Encounter.  I spent the next decade dividing my time between the Jewish neighborhoods of Jerusalem and the Palestinian cities of the West Bank.  I crossed physical borders and invisible boundaries so frequently that I experienced 'cultural whiplash,' in one moment on a Palestinian bus headed to Ramallah and in the next, on the beaches of Herziliyah Pituach. 

I drank mint tea with former fighters turned-nonviolent activists; I danced dabka and ate plates and plates of maqloube;  I watched the sun rise over the hills of Jerusalem and watched the sun set over the hills of Bethlehem.  I fell in and out of love with an Israeli and then with a Palestinian on my quest for my b'sheret, my soulmate.

I witnessed the horrors of the Israeli  Occupation, but I also witnessed the integrity of those who resist it.  I felt the heartache of how things are and an inkling of hope around how things could be.

I have a story to tell that many Jewish American institutions who are trying to hold onto the status quo would prefer wasn't told, which is precisely why I need to tell it.

Your support will help me finish writing my book.  

[Photo credit: Bruce Shaffer. Ilana with Leila Sansour on Encounter tour, Beit Jala, Bethlehem.]

I feel a deep sense of obligation to tell this story because it's not just my story.  This is the story of every Palestinian and every Israeli I met, every person I've met, who is working for a future that honors diversity and justice over segregation and discrimination; a future that prioritizes human life over financial profit; and most of all, a future that is founded not on fear and hatred but on chesed, on active-love, a deep and abiding commitment to lifting up our shared humanity as beings created in the Divine Image. That is our true birthright.

I've written a book about the time I spent immersed in the heart of Israel/Palestine, and I need your help to hire an editor to finish the project.  I have a complete draft of my manuscript, 360 unedited pages of narrative.

At this stage, I need help to cover the expenses involved with editing my book project.  I have found an extraordinary professional editor.  She comes highly recommended and I'm eager to work with her.  Your contributions will help:

  • Hire a professional editor to do developmental editing 
  • Work in close partnership with my editor to craft a moving and compelling narrative
  • Finalize the manuscript through a process of precise, line by line editing

Your support means an incredible amount to me, and I offer my profound gratitude for whatever you're able to offer.  The listing on the sidebar of "Perks" offer a sense of the expenses connected to this project. I offer them as a figurative framework for the money I need to raise to complete this book.  

Please note that contributions are not tax deductible.

Background

In my early years in Jerusalem, everything I thought I knew about Israel unraveled, and along the way, I did too.  The Israeli Occupation, which had previously been an abstract concept, was brought into sharp focus.  I saw the Israeli army demolish homes of innocent Palestinian families.  With each demolished house, a previous part of my Jewish identity was demolished.  

I saw the Israeli army uproot the olive trees of Palestinian farmers whose only source of livelihood was destroyed so that the Israeli government could build new settlements.  And with each uprooted tree, what I thought I knew about Israel was uprooted.

But along the way, as I struggled with my shock, disbelief, fury and shame, I witnessed something else unexpected: the abiding, resilient integrity of Palestinians and Israelis willing to resist the injustices of the Israeli Occupation.   I saw Palestinians organize marches to protest segregation on Hebron's Shuahada Street. I saw Israelis put their bodies between violent settlers and Palestinian farmers shepherding their flocks.   

[Photographer: Gili Getz; Sumud Freedom Camp,Sarura, May 19, 2017]

In 2012, I founded the Center for Jewish Nonviolence to mobilize Jews from around the world to join the Palestinian led nonviolent movement on the ground.  Together, Palestinians, Israelis and Jews say NO to Occupation and displacement and YES to a shared future based on human dignity.

My journey, from Brooklyn to Jerusalem, from Bethlehem to Tel Aviv, from Herziliya Pituach to Ramallah, challenged me in ways I could not have predicted when I first stepped foot on a bus heading to Al Khader in Bethlehem. 

I'd like to share this journey with others to contribute to a future based on increased awareness that will lead to just action.  I hope to offer the kind of wisdom that reminds us in the deepest sense of our extraordinary shared humanity, sparking the social and political change that is so desperately needed today.

Thank you for your support.

story:
My name is Filip and I'm a travel and food geek that has always been hungry for the world. Some time ago I started blogging about food and places I enjoy. Then, a few weeks ago, I decided to start living a life driven by passion - I quit my job and started working on my round-the-world cookbook project. It wasn't easy, but literally every rose has its thorn :). 

Did you know there are over 248 nations in the world? If each has its own cuisine, the world is a huge menu with plenty of dishes to try. What I want to do is to travel around the world and write a cook book capturing most inspiring flavours I can find. This way everyone will have a chance to taste the world. You'll find some more details in the vid below and on the project's site: www.hungry4theworld.com.


The trip is planned to last at least 12 months and the route as follows: United Arab Emirates - Japan - South Korea - China - Vietnam - Cambodia - Thailand - Laos - Myanmar - Malaysia - Philippines - India - Indonesia - Australia - New Zealand - Chile - Peru - Bolivia - Brazil - Argentina (this list might be extended on the go).

As I want it to be that comprehensive, it makes it quite complex - I will not be able to complete this cookbook without YOUR HANDS ON BOARD!

What we need to cover is: 

  • transportation: flights, ferries, buses - they all are costly; help me to ride through Asia & Australia, flight over Pacific and get through South America
  • accommodation: applicable wherever CouchSurfing fails
  • meals & beverages: the most essential thing in my project - help me find the greatest flavors around the world
  • work tools: the basics - insuring my laptop and gadgets; phone calls, internet connection, etc.
  • on the go (fees, fares, visas, etc.): all the unexpected expenses, visas, fees and fares - painful, but inevitable

Amazing flavors of course! I'll be more than happy to share the trip with you: all people I meet, all flavors I taste and places I see - here on the project's site: www.hungry4theworld.com. I also prepared some tasty perks for you:

If you just can't contribute, but still want to help me, it would be great if you share my idea and make some noise about my campaign - let's taste ENTIRE world together! 


Follow me:

  • Twitter
  • Instagram
  • My Blog

story:
Short Summary

My name is Nia King and I run a podcast called We Want the Airwaves where I interview queer and trans artists of color about their lives and their work. In 2014, I self-published a collection of these interviews called Queer & Trans Artists of Color: Stories of Some of Our Lives with co-editors Jessica Glennon-Zukoff and Terra Mikalson. Since summer of 2015, my new co-editor Elena Rose and I have been working on a second collection of interviews with QTPOC, and in October 2016 it will finally be finished. We are asking for your help to throw an amazing, accessible launch party, and go to Seattle, Portland, and LA!

The book is a self-published, do-it-yourself labor of love and we are booking the tour ourselves. All of our funding so far has come from individuals, mostly giving small donations of $5-$25. It means so much that you believe in us. Please help us continue the important work of documenting and sharing the words of living queer and trans artists of color by funding our West Coast book tour!

    Here's how we're going to use the money.

    • Hiring ASL interpreters for book launch party.
    • Paying artists. We'll be asking local queer and trans artists of color to perform with us in every city when we go on tour. We will pay all of them.
    • Food and gas to get us from place to place.
    • Cheap hotels. Chronic pain makes sleeping on floors and couches really difficult.

    The Impact

    The Queer & Trans Artists of Color series of books documents and shares the important artistic and cultural work being done by living queer and trans artists of color right now. Black and brown genius is criminally under-recognized. We are working hard to remedy this.

    The book includes interviews with:

    • Juba Kalamka
    • Indira Allegra
    • Mattie Brice
    • Ajuan Mance
    • Cherry Galette
    • Lexi Adsit
    • micha cárdenas
    • Martin Sorrondeguy
    • Mimi Thi Nguyen
    • Tina Takemoto
    • Vivek Shraya
    • Amir Rabiyah
    • Trish Salah
    • Kiley May
    • Grace Rosario Perkins
    • and Elena Rose!

    With your support, we can make all our tour events free and open to the public.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you can't donate now, we totally understand. You can still help by spreading the word about this campaign. Also, if you want us to come to your city and have contacts with a wheelchair-accessible venue or college there, please hit us up at niaking(at)zoho(dot)com. We are still booking gigs (and planning be an East Coast tour for the spring)!

story:
About Angels and Avalon Book One

Reviews from Goodreads.com have heralded the debut novel as “poetic”.

“The story is fantastic… It’s well written and will definitely draw you in.” 

“I don’t normally read books that have gods, goddesses and magic but this book was able to keep my interest the entire time.”

From a dark world, an unwanted nameless girl is saved by Goddess and brought to a secret paradise, Avalon, in which she finds a home and a name, Adamina.

The Archangel Gabriel wants to retire from his duties as an Arch, a life void of freewill and filled with destruction and battle. Goddess allows him refuge on Avalon on the condition he protect her treasure.

Rumors spread about a secret paradise, and God sends Gabriel’s brothers, the other Archangels, to search for this land and the god who formed it. The Angels bring a new threat to Avalon and Adamina.

Lucifer aspires to build a better universe, and get revenge on God for casting him out of heaven. Avalon is the perfect place of power to do that and Adamina its key. What he doesn’t know about Avalon and Adamina brings his plans for revenge to a halt.

Reincarnation carries Adamina and Gabriel through a desperate attempt to find each other and stop Lucifer. But a soul can only take so much. Elizabeth McAllistar wants a new life free of Angels and Avalon. Will she be able to overcome the tragedy, magic, and the past that haunts her?

Short Summary

Catherine Milos is a Canadian author who has been writing stories since she could hold a crayon. She writes about the intricacies of the human condition through characters as they face fantastical circumstances. She has a Bachelors in English and 10+ years experience as a writer, editor, and consultant in the field.

“Ten years after the idea for the story of Angels and Avalon took hold of my life, I dedicated myself to learning the writing craft until I could properly tell the story. I worked multiple jobs so I could independently publish the tale. I released the print and e-book version through Createspace and Amazon in fall 2015.

My years of hard work and self-funding have landed a little short of the needed funds.  Book two's manuscript is nearing completion and I would like to reach out to fans on a more personal level.

Thank you for partnering with me to launch promotion and publication efforts for my novel series!”

The Impact

Without this contribution, fans may have to wait a significant amount of time before I am able to reach out to them personally. 

I hope this campaign will help lay the foundation for the future success as a professional author.

I am an advocate for many causes including animal rights and welfare, environmental care, psychological health and awareness, and a number of humanitarian efforts. Part of the proceeds from the sale of my books will be given to a number of these important causes.

Other Ways You Can Help

Purchase my book here and share it with family, friends and acquaintances. If you own a copy of the book, please write a review on Goodreads.com and/or Amazon sites, all feedback is welcome!

If you are not be able to contribute financially but still want to help, please share my campaign with others. You can also spread the good word by visiting my blog, Facebook page Catherine Milos Official, and Twitter @Catherine Milos. Keep an eye out for contests and exclusive offers available to fans.

My blog touches on a number of subjects including; writing, other great authors, language, nature, healing, and, of course, tasty morsels of writing-project insiders. If you have any questions regarding my work or this campaign please reach me here. 

What I Need & What You Get

The funds raised will go towards

  • Purchase print books to bring to small bookstores across Canada and for promotional giveaways and signings for $1,300.
  • Three Canadian author events by April 30, 2017 in small bookstores across Canada for $800.
  • Advertising campaigns and materials for online and in-person events $400.
  • If raised additional funds will go towards the publication expenses (formatting, editing, promotion) of Book Two.
  • All funds up to the goal raised will go to the promotion of Angels and Avalon Book One and face to face connection with fans.
  • See the Perks section for some great incentives. Higher tiers are eligible to also receive any or all lower perks of their choice. 

Excerpt from Angels and Avalon

Run. Her feet struggled to comply with the command her mind bellowed. Run! Heavy foot falls echoed behind her and encouraged her forward. She darted into a side street and hoped it would not dead-end. She had no idea where she was going. The new sensations in her feet as they hit cobblestone caused her legs to jolt and jar uncomfortably. She turned left and dodged a few people walking in the morning air. Not that there was any air left in this retched place. She sped around another corner and paused to listen for the steps of the guards over her pounding heart. A faint echo from behind told her they were coming. The softer their foot falls, the closer her mother’s guards were to catching their prey.

She ducked into an alley and curled up in the shadows. She prayed, hoping against all odds that they would not find her. Soon the foot falls grew silent and she feared the worst. She had heard from the other prisoners in her mother’s dungeon that the guards whispered your name before sealing your fate with a swift blade, if they were feeling merciful. She wondered what it was they would whisper to her. She had no name. Would they be merciful and swift or would they end her short existence slowly?

She hoped her inner-light, as her mother had called it, would not betray her hiding place. She tried to rub soot all over her exposed skin. The dark green dress her lady in waiting had stolen for her covered most of her, but her neck, face, arms, and feet lay bare. Her skin was pale like moonlight, glowing white with subtle, swirling pinks, greens and blues just beneath the surface. Her hair could not make up its mind, changing with the weather, her mood, or the light – flowing from chestnut to auburn, auburn to the colors of fire, and fire to the color of straw and back again. It was not her fault she was so bright. She would change if she could. She would be like the others with their dark hair, grayed skin, and dark eyes. But she was not and could not be like them.

Towers of smoke billowed from homes. Soot fell, coating the bitter cold ground. If there was ever any color in this world, surely the smoke and soot would have choked it out quickly. The crumbling church steeple teetered like a gaping maw, ready to swallow up all the light and joy in the world and spew darkness from its blackened depths. She had heard other children talking about it as they sat outside the dungeon walls to try and get a glimpse of her, the freakish daughter of the Queen.

The girl turned away from the sight of the church and curled up closer to the wall. Her mother, had no other heir, but would not pass on her throne to someone like her daughter. She was too soft, too loving, too bright to rule over the type of court the Queen had built and maintained: a court of darkness and pain. Six years in the darkness and shadows of the dungeon, facing the demons, sorcerers and criminals her mother sent down there had not chased the light from her eyes. She closed her eyes tightly to hide their dancing colors. In the interest of her kingdom the Queen declared an alternative heir, a distant male relative, and ordered her nameless daughter killed so she could not try to claim the throne for herself. Fearing for her life, she had escaped from the dungeons and now cowered in the corner of a frigid dead-end.

It wasn’t long until the little nameless girl lost all sensation from the cold. She may have cried, but her tears had dried up long ago. Instead, she fell into a fitful, exhausted sleep hidden by soot and darkness. She drifted in the bright world of dreams. The only place she had ever felt she had belonged.

A growing light surrounded her and pulled her from her dreams. Her imaginings of trees and blue sky flew past her.  Beyond her dreams was a blinding white light. She drifted there unable to move or speak. Terror flashed through her, but it was chased away by a sense of warmth and safety. For the first time in her life, the unfortunate girl felt safe enough to let go and sleep deeply.

(...)

Adamina, Goddess whispered, Adamina, wake up child.

Lightning snapped through the sky and thunder shook Adamina awake. The rain poured down over the green hills. Fear and adrenaline filled her as she clambered to her feet. She had to keep running. She ran down the hill and into a plain covered in grass and clover slick with rain drops. Adamina’s eyes darted wildly, searching for the inevitable arrival of … what. She couldn’t remember what she was running from. The scent of lavender and lemon thyme filled her lungs, causing her fear to ebb and her racing heart to slow slightly. A forest on the other side of a plain came in view and Adamina jogged towards it. She tripped over a tree root and fell.

Soil! Fresh soil? No soil was left in her mother’s kingdom as far as she had known. Before she had been given to the dungeons, the little nameless girl rode out on a little brown pony in search of a patch of soil and seeds. Stories of trees and forests, wildlife and plants beyond those few harvested in the soot-covered fields ignited her curiosity. Digging in the ground all she had found was sand and soot. The trees and flowers she had dreamed about would never be. And yet, here they were in front of her very eyes.

Adamina pulled herself up off the ground and looked around slowly. Trees clouded her vision. The rhythm of rain drops sliding and bursting on leaves above her were the only sounds she could hear.  Her mouth gaped at the scene and she had to blink and rub her eyes several times before she began to believe. Adamina realized that she was not cold. She had always been cold. The new warmth caused her limbs to ache. The tempo of the rain began to slow and she walked unhurriedly, taking in the forest, mentally mapping exits and clearings as she came across them.

When the sun began to peek through the clouds and the rain stopped, Adamina found herself in a large clearing. The path that led her there had been made of fine reddish and grey sand that clung to her feet. A small circular space was framed by two stone benches. Adamina had never before seen so much sun, so much color and life. She gaped in awe as her gaze stretch up and up over smooth stone.

 A temple reached high above with pillars taller than trees and four stone steps each nearly as tall as she was. Humming began to fill her blood and urge her into the darkness past the doorway of the temple. A small voice inside her heart answering her unspoken question told her this place was called Avalon.

She remembered temples. Gods lived in temples. She climbed the large stone steps until she faced the entrance. Inside was pitch black and silent. Adamina stepped into the darkness. At first nothing happened, so Adamina kept moving forward. Then she fell.

Facebook page Catherine Milos Official, and Twitter @Catherine Milos. Keep an eye out
for contests and exclusive offers available to fans.
My blog touches on a number of subjects including; writing,
other great authors, language, nature, healing, and, of course, tasty morsels
of writing-project insiders. If you have any questions regarding my work or
this campaign please reach me here. 
What I Need & What You Get
The funds raised will go towards

Purchase print books to bring to small bookstores across Canada and for promotional giveaways and signings for $1,300.
Three Canadian author events by April 30, 2017 in small bookstores across Canada for $800.
Advertising campaigns and materials for online and in-person events $400.
If raised additional funds will go towards the publication expenses (formatting, editing, promotion) of Book Two.
All funds up to the goal raised will go to the promotion of Angels and Avalon Book One and face to face connection with fans.
See the Perks section for some great incentives. Higher tiers are eligible to also receive any or all lower perks of their choice. 


Excerpt from Angels and Avalon


Run. Her feet struggled to comply with the
command her mind bellowed. Run! Heavy foot falls echoed behind her and
encouraged her forward. She darted into a side street and hoped it would not
dead-end. She had no idea where she was going. The new sensations in her feet
as they hit cobblestone caused her legs to jolt and jar uncomfortably. She
turned left and dodged a few people walking in the morning air. Not that there
was any air left in this retched place. She sped around another corner and
paused to listen for the steps of the guards over her pounding heart. A faint
echo from behind told her they were coming. The softer their foot falls, the
closer her mother’s guards were to catching their prey.
She ducked into an alley and curled up in
the shadows. She prayed, hoping against all odds that they would not find her.
Soon the foot falls grew silent and she feared the worst. She had heard from
the other prisoners in her mother’s dungeon that the guards whispered your name
before sealing your fate with a swift blade, if they were feeling merciful. She
wondered what it was they would whisper to her. She had no name. Would they be
merciful and swift or would they end her short existence slowly? 
She hoped her inner-light, as her mother
had called it, would not betray her hiding place. She tried to rub soot all
over her exposed skin. The dark green dress her lady in waiting had stolen for
her covered most of her, but her neck, face, arms, and feet lay bare. Her skin
was pale like moonlight, glowing white with subtle, swirling pinks, greens and
blues just beneath the surface. Her hair could not make up its mind, changing
with the weather, her mood, or the light – flowing from chestnut to auburn,
auburn to the colors of fire, and fire to the color of straw and back again. It
was not her fault she was so bright. She would change if she could. She would
be like the others with their dark hair, grayed skin, and dark eyes. But she
was not and could not be like them. 
Towers of smoke billowed from homes. Soot
fell, coating the bitter cold ground. If there was ever any color in this
world, surely the smoke and soot would have choked it out quickly. The
crumbling church steeple teetered like a gaping maw, ready to swallow up all
the light and joy in the world and spew darkness from its blackened depths. She
had heard other children talking about it as they sat outside the dungeon walls
to try and get a glimpse of her, the freakish daughter of the Queen. 
The girl turned away from the sight of the
church and curled up closer to the wall. Her mother, had no other heir, but
would not pass on her throne to someone like her daughter. She was too soft,
too loving, too bright to rule over the type of court the Queen had built and
maintained: a court of darkness and pain. Six years in the darkness and shadows
of the dungeon, facing the demons, sorcerers and criminals her mother sent down
there had not chased the light from her eyes. She closed her eyes tightly to
hide their dancing colors. In the interest of her kingdom the Queen declared an
alternative heir, a distant male relative, and ordered her nameless daughter
killed so she could not try to claim the throne for herself. Fearing for her
life, she had escaped from the dungeons and now cowered in the corner of a
frigid dead-end.
It wasn’t long until the little nameless
girl lost all sensation from the cold. She may have cried, but her tears had
dried up long ago. Instead, she fell into a fitful, exhausted sleep hidden by
soot and darkness. She drifted in the bright world of dreams. The only place
she had ever felt she had belonged.

A growing light surrounded her and pulled her from her
dreams. Her imaginings of trees and blue sky flew past her.  Beyond her dreams was a blinding white light.
She drifted there unable to move or speak. Terror flashed through her, but it
was chased away by a sense of warmth and safety. For the first time in her
life, the unfortunate girl felt safe enough to let go and sleep deeply.(...)
Adamina, Goddess whispered, Adamina, wake up child.
Lightning
snapped through the sky and thunder shook Adamina awake. The rain poured down
over the green hills. Fear and adrenaline filled her as she clambered to her
feet. She had to keep running. She ran down the hill and into a plain covered
in grass and clover slick with rain drops. Adamina’s eyes darted wildly,
searching for the inevitable arrival of … what. She couldn’t remember what she
was running from. The scent of lavender and lemon thyme filled her lungs,
causing her fear to ebb and her racing heart to slow slightly. A forest on the
other side of a plain came in view and Adamina jogged towards it. She tripped
over a tree root and fell. 
Soil!
Fresh soil? No soil was left in her mother’s kingdom as far as she had known. Before
she had been given to the dungeons, the little nameless girl rode out on a
little brown pony in search of a patch of soil and seeds. Stories of trees and
forests, wildlife and plants beyond those few harvested in the soot-covered
fields ignited her curiosity. Digging in the ground all she had found was sand
and soot. The trees and flowers she had dreamed about would never be. And yet,
here they were in front of her very eyes.
Adamina
pulled herself up off the ground and looked around slowly. Trees clouded her
vision. The rhythm of rain drops sliding and bursting on leaves above her were
the only sounds she could hear.  Her
mouth gaped at the scene and she had to blink and rub her eyes several times
before she began to believe. Adamina realized that she was not cold. She had
always been cold. The new warmth caused her limbs to ache. The tempo of the rain
began to slow and she walked unhurriedly, taking in the forest, mentally
mapping exits and clearings as she came across them. 
When
the sun began to peek through the clouds and the rain stopped, Adamina found
herself in a large clearing. The path that led her there had been made of fine
reddish and grey sand that clung to her feet. A small circular space was framed
by two stone benches. Adamina had never before seen so much sun, so much color
and life. She gaped in awe as her gaze stretch up and up over smooth stone.
 A temple reached high above with pillars
taller than trees and four stone steps each nearly as tall as she was. Humming
began to fill her blood and urge her into the darkness past the doorway of the
temple. A small voice inside her heart answering her unspoken question told her
this place was called Avalon.

She
remembered temples. Gods lived in temples. She climbed the large stone steps
until she faced the entrance. Inside was pitch black and silent. Adamina
stepped into the darkness. At first nothing happened, so Adamina kept moving
forward. Then she fell.

story:
The Story

In a future ripe with geopolitical tension, everyone is living their lives and trying to find their place as well as they can. The ascension of China, the breakup of the USA, the consolidation of the EU and several other major developments have left the world divided along new fault-lines. At the same time, old rivalries and dreams of greater futures are threatening the fragile stability of the world order.

How to find purpose in this fragmented world? What to do when your loyalties are divided? How to balance professional demands and personal needs? Where to go when you can no longer stay? What to do when the once solid ground is shaking beneath you?

You can find free E-Book and PDF-versions of A Sunless Dusk at:

https://thelongnighttrilogy.wixsite.com/asunles...

 

The Campaign

A Sunless Dusk has been a passion project of mine for a long time. Now that it is time to launch it, I wanted everyone who wanted to read it to be able to do so, free of charge. Therefore, I opted to raise the funds associated with its production through this campaign rather than a regular publication. Hence, you don't have pay to access the e-book version of A Sunless Dusk. However, by contributing to this campaign, you're not only helping me to cover incurred costs, but also aid in my ability to continue the trilogy. With a contribution, you may also earn the following perks:

  • Personal thank you e-mail (€2)
  • Pocket version of A Sunless Dusk (€25 + shipping)
  • Hardback version of A Sunless Dusk (€60 + shipping)
  • Character in e-book exclusive extended trilogy version (€500)

 

All contributions at or above €2 will also be entitled to a mention on the online hall of contributors.

Also, if the combined contributions reach certain milestones, they would enable the following:

  • Covering direct expenses and remunerate those who have contributed to the final product (€1000)
  • High-School teaching material based on A Sunless Dusk integrating English, Politics and History. To be given to schools without charge (€5000)
  • Audiobook adaptation of A Sunless Dusk (€10000)
  • Ability to publish the next novel in The Long Night trilogy before the end of 2022 (€20000) - Now a flexible goal: Become a backer to learn about the current publishing goal!

 

Me

My name is Carl Björvang and I'm a PhD student in Economic History with a background in International Relations. I've been writing fiction since I was in my mid-teens. However, A Sunless Dusk is the first full-length novel I've written in English.
