story:
Want something good to read? Take a look at William's short story, The Bridge, which you can download from the gallery. 

 

Hi, my name is Mike Harris, the grandson of William E. Thomas. I am in the middle of a project to publish and promote my grandfather's wonderful books. Having successfully published the first part of the trilogy, Pegasus Falling, I've now turned my attention to getting the second book published.

 

#LetsgetGrampspublished!

 

“Brilliant is the only way to describe Pegasus Falling...A masterpiece of historical fiction.”

“A wonderful epic. This is an intriguing story, gripping from the first page to the last and full of sorrow, happiness, kindness and heartbreak.”

“I have been kept spellbound by this wonderful story.”

“I couldn't put it down and read it from start to finish in one day!”

 

On his retirement, William sat down to write a novel. The result was The Cypress Branches, an epic, beautifully written love story set against the backdrop of World War II and its aftermath.

It turned out he’d written an incredible piece of literary fiction. Ever since Pegasus Falling, the first part the Cypress Branches trilogy, was released last year, it has had praise heaped on it from readers and reviewers all over the globe.

Pegasus Falling follows the story of Sammy Parker, a World War II paratrooper who, after attacking a German officer, finds himself incarcerated in a concentration camp. There he discovers not only the horrors of the Nazi's final solution, but also Naomi, a woman who Sammy comes to depend on to survive. When the camp is liberated, the couple are separated and Sammy must battle to find out what happened to the woman he loves.

Part two of the trilogy, titled It Never Was You, is just about ready for release. Following the heartbreaking story of a middle class merchant seaman and his unexpected and rollercoaster relationship with a beautiful, exuberant waitress from the Liverpool docks, it continues the saga started in Pegasus Falling and packs a lot of emotion, drama and history into its pages.

Part love story, part social history, The Cypress Branches weaves together the stories of an incredible set of characters whose lives and loves are buffeted by the ever changing attitudes and culture of the twentieth century. They are ordinary people caught up in extraordinary times and it makes for exhilarating reading. 

 

 

    

 

What we need and what it will mean...

This is a series of books which was always meant to be published and read, but shortly after finishing them, William started to fall ill and was diagnosed with Alzheimer’s disease.

As the disease took hold it seemed that William's dream of seeing his work published was over. But I wasn't prepared to see the story end there.

Why? Because when I read The Cypress Branches I totally fell in love with it. And that is the case for a vast majority of other readers. It’s one of those books that when you read it, you want all your friends to read it as soon as possible so that you have someone else you can talk to about it. 

I became determined that William should see his book in print and that it should have the chance to reach the audience it deserves. 

After printing a limited run of hardbacks of the original manuscript in 2009, and fulfilling one dream by presenting a delighted William with a copy of his published book, I turned my attention to getting his work out to a wider audience. 

William wrote The Cypress Branches in an episodic form, so I have been able to adapt the huge tome into a more manageable trilogy for release as a series of paperbacks. The first part - Pegasus Falling - was released in March last year. As well as universally excellent reviews, it was also named as a Finalist in The Kindle Book Review’s Best Indie Books of 2012 contest.

Part two - titled It Never Was You - has been edited and is almost ready to release. I can't wait to get copies into the hands of readers who will love it, but I need funds to make that happen. 

And that’s where this campaign comes in. By raising funds early, I can give It Never Was You the launch it deserves. The £500 will finance an initial print run of the paperback. If we can raise even more, it will mean I can put together an effective marketing campaign and start work on the final instalment straight away.

This is a flexible funding campaign, so if I don’t reach the target amount, I’ll still invest what I have raised into the books. It will take much longer to complete the trilogy, though. That would be upsetting. Let's not think about it.

 

The Perks...

Get stuck in to the trilogy...

I’m determined that everyone who backs this campaign should get the chance to read at least one of the books in return, no matter what their budget...

If you haven’t yet read any of William’s books, just £3 (approx $5) will get you a digital copy of Pegasus Falling and £9 (approx $14) will get you the paperback sent directly from me to you. 

 

Be one of the first to read It Never Was You...

If you’d like to be one of the first to read It Never Was You, you can be by choosing either the “digital saga continues” or “paperback saga continues” perk. These will be sent out to you the moment they’re off the press. I’m anticipating the ebook to be ready early-mid March and the paperback to be printed by mid-late March. They won’t be released to the shops until late April, so you should get your copy well in advance!

 

Get Personal...

For a £20 contribution, I’ll make it personal. Alas, William’s illness means he is unable to autograph his books, but I can offer you a personal, hand-written thank you note inside your book written by me, his grandson. It’s not the same, but it’s the next best thing...

If you’re as excited about the Cypress Branches trilogy as I am, then you’ll love the £75 perk. Not only will you be sent paperback copies of both Pegasus Falling and It Never Was You as soon as they’re available (with a personal thank you note in each one), you’ll also be named as a key sponsor on the acknowledgements page of It Never Was You. And you'll get the third book when it's released. 

 

Want something extra special?

Then you’ll want the The Cypress Branches Special Edition. For £100 contribution, not only will you receive everything in the £75 perk, but you’ll also get a copy of the beautiful special limited edition of the original hardback. Containing the manuscript as William wrote it (before I adapted it into a trilogy), only 108 copies were printed and it will never be printed in this form again. Each copy comes with its own certificate telling you which copy you have in the print run. Only family and close friends got copies and only a handful remain, so get in quick! 

 

Find out more about the Special Edition on the blog 

 

Want to know more? 

Find out more about William and his books on the blog

See what other readers are saying about Pegasus Falling on Amazon and Goodreads 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone can contribute directly, and we understand that. But there are plenty of other ways you help out...

Follow us on twitter (@cypressbranches) and tweet away about our campaign...use the hashtag #LetsgetGrampspublished to help it trend

Like the page on Facebook (www.facebook.com/CypressBranches) and join in the conversation about the books...

Use the Indiegogo share tools (under the video at the top of the page)...

Tell your friends and family about the campaign and get them to join in.

 

Whether you back us with cash or with kindness (or with both!), I can’t thank you enough for your support. Every little helps, and with each £, the family’s dream of seeing William’s books in print gets a little closer.

Thank you!

Pegasus Falling follows the story of Sammy Parker, a World War II paratrooper who, after attacking a German officer, finds himself incarcerated in a concentration camp. There he discovers not only the horrors of the Nazi's final solution, but also Naomi, a woman who Sammy comes to depend on to survive. When the camp is liberated, the couple are separated and Sammy must battle to find out what happened to the woman he loves.

Part two of the trilogy, titled It Never Was You, is just about ready for release. Following the heartbreaking story of a middle class merchant seaman and his unexpected and rollercoaster relationship with a beautiful, exuberant waitress from the Liverpool docks, it continues the saga started in Pegasus Falling and packs a lot of emotion, drama and history into its pages.
Part love story, part social history, The Cypress Branches weaves together the stories of an incredible set of characters whose lives and loves are buffeted by the ever changing attitudes and culture of the twentieth century. They are ordinary people caught up in extraordinary times and it makes for exhilarating reading. 
 
 
    
 
What we need and what it will mean...
This is a series of books which was always meant to be published and read, but shortly after finishing them, William started to fall ill and was diagnosed with Alzheimer’s disease.
As the disease took hold it seemed that William's dream of seeing his work published was over. But I wasn't prepared to see the story end there.
Why? Because when I read The Cypress Branches I totally fell in love with it. And that is the case for a vast majority of other readers. It’s one of those books that when you read it, you want all your friends to read it as soon as possible so that you have someone else you can talk to about it. 
I became determined that William should see his book in print and that it should have the chance to reach the audience it deserves. 
After printing a limited run of hardbacks of the original manuscript in 2009, and fulfilling one dream by presenting a delighted William with a copy of his published book, I turned my attention to getting his work out to a wider audience. 
William wrote The Cypress Branches in an episodic form, so I have been able to adapt the huge tome into a more manageable trilogy for release as a series of paperbacks. The first part - Pegasus Falling - was released in March last year. As well as universally excellent reviews, it was also named as a Finalist in The Kindle Book Review’s Best Indie Books of 2012 contest.
Part two - titled It Never Was You - has been edited and is almost ready to release. I can't wait to get copies into the hands of readers who will love it, but I need funds to make that happen. 
And that’s where this campaign comes in. By raising funds early, I can give It Never Was You the launch it deserves. The £500 will finance an initial print run of the paperback. If we can raise even more, it will mean I can put together an effective marketing campaign and start work on the final instalment straight away.
This is a flexible funding campaign, so if I don’t reach the target amount, I’ll still invest what I have raised into the books. It will take much longer to complete the trilogy, though. That would be upsetting. Let's not think about it.
 
The Perks...
Get stuck in to the trilogy...
I’m determined that everyone who backs this campaign should get the chance to read at least one of the books in return, no matter what their budget...
If you haven’t yet read any of William’s books, just £3 (approx $5) will get you a digital copy of Pegasus Falling and £9 (approx $14) will get you the paperback sent directly from me to you. 
 
Be one of the first to read It Never Was You...
If you’d like to be one of the first to read It Never Was You, you can be by choosing either the “digital saga continues” or “paperback saga continues” perk. These will be sent out to you the moment they’re off the press. I’m anticipating the ebook to be ready early-mid March and the paperback to be printed by mid-late March. They won’t be released to the shops until late April, so you should get your copy well in advance!
 
Get Personal...
For a £20 contribution, I’ll make it personal. Alas, William’s illness means he is unable to autograph his books, but I can offer you a personal, hand-written thank you note inside your book written by me, his grandson. It’s not the same, but it’s the next best thing...
If you’re as excited about the Cypress Branches trilogy as I am, then you’ll love the £75 perk. Not only will you be sent paperback copies of both Pegasus Falling and It Never Was You as soon as they’re available (with a personal thank you note in each one), you’ll also be named as a key sponsor on the acknowledgements page of It Never Was You. And you'll get the third book when it's released. 
 
Want something extra special?

Then you’ll want the The Cypress Branches Special Edition. For £100 contribution, not only will you receive everything in the £75 perk, but you’ll also get a copy of the beautiful special limited edition of the original hardback. Containing the manuscript as William wrote it (before I adapted it into a trilogy), only 108 copies were printed and it will never be printed in this form again. Each copy comes with its own certificate telling you which copy you have in the print run. Only family and close friends got copies and only a handful remain, so get in quick! 
 
Find out more about the Special Edition on the blog 
 
Want to know more? 
Find out more about William and his books on the blog
See what other readers are saying about Pegasus Falling on Amazon and Goodreads 
 
Other Ways You Can Help
Not everyone can contribute directly, and we understand that. But there are plenty of other ways you help out...
Follow us on twitter (@cypressbranches) and tweet away about our campaign...use the hashtag #LetsgetGrampspublished to help it trend
Like the page on Facebook (www.facebook.com/CypressBranches) and join in the conversation about the books...
Use the Indiegogo share tools (under the video at the top of the page)...
Tell your friends and family about the campaign and get them to join in.
 
Whether you back us with cash or with kindness (or with both!), I can’t thank you enough for your support. Every little helps, and with each £, the family’s dream of seeing William’s books in print gets a little closer.
Thank you!

story:
Our Mission: Populus is a political social network that promotes civic communication between citizens, advocacy groups, and elected officials by providing the tools and access to equip a more politically influential populace. 
Overview: Populus is a web startup dedicated to improving methods of political organization.

We want our government to be truly for the people, by the people. With Populus, citizens from coast to coast can take back their country. For too long, Washington D.C. has seemingly operated apart from the rest of the country, and even now, average Americans are as out of touch with their government as ever. With the innovation that social technology brings, the lack of communication between the government and its constituents should no longer be tolerated. For the democratic process to thrive, it must innovate and improve like any great institution.

Today, at Populus, we are working to bring our government into the internet age. Our website equips you, and all Americans, with the means to take your rightful place in the political process, irrespective of creed, political affiliation, ethnicity, or background. Together with elected officials and advocacy groups, you can interact on a social media platform that takes collaboration and communication to new heights. Using the very same ingenuity and determination that has always defined the American spirit, we have designed the first ever template for 21st-Century, democratic governance: Populus.

But this process cannot be done on a small scale. This website can only revitalize our government if the people of this country, from our leadership on Capitol Hill to those who work tirelessly for a better life, commit to the cause.

In order to maintain the website’s integrity and to reinforce our commitment to a user-driven experience, we have chosen to make this a not-for-profit venture. This choice makes our success dependent upon the generosity and the support of individuals like you. In part, it means that Populus relies on the help of volunteers, and everyday people who want to move our country forward.

Every time you give to this cause, consider it an investment. It is an investment in your country, in yourself, in your children, in your security, your health, your future, your dreams, and in your values.

 

So please, we implore you to take a stand for democracy. Don’t allow your needs to be forgotten, ignite your patriotic spirit.  Help our country move forward: join the movement.

story:
Short Summary

Hey, My name is Laurie, I am a Traffic reporter in Seattle.  I raised three kids as a single mom, after my husband left me for David... Not only that, he took my best tiara and solidified my status as a single mom.

I wanted someone to tell me "this is not as good as it gets"  I was working a nowhere job, with no chance of increase pay.  I had a dream and it was dying.  I realized I had to be the one... I had to take the steps to live my dream so i could encourage and mentor others to do the same.

What We Need & What You Get

Now that the book is out I would love your help in getting boxes of books. I would like to donate to women's shelters, The Family Resouce Center, Queen it's a New Day and other non profits that help single parents.  As well as books for me to have when I go out and speak to sell at the back of the room.  Not only will you get my undying gratitude but I will send you a copy of the Ebook... but wait.... there's more.....

The Impact

I have been volunteering with Queen It's a New Day, an organization that gives women a "hand up" rather than a "hand out."  I can see the difference my story makes in their lives.  If I can make it.... they can too.  This is another step in living my dream and taking a step and a risk to make it happen and then showing others the way.  Thank you for being a part of this POWERFUL MESSAGE.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute financially, we all know the power of networking and if you could help me get the word out I would be so very grateful.
  • you can use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Facebook
  • and word of mouth
  • Encourage others to buy the book from my website didnotseethatcoming.com
  • Amazon or where ever books are sold

story:
Untitled 1

I'm Joe Plummer, I'm an author, and I write primarily about criminal influence within our banking and political system. 

A rough draft of my most recent book, Tragedy & Hope 101, is now complete and available (for free) at TragedyAndHope.INFO. Now, it's just a matter of completing the final editing, getting the book into physical form, and then putting it into as many hands as possible.

I know that this is where I'm supposed to write some kind of "pitch" for the book, but this always makes me feel uncomfortable. Fortunately, G. Edward Griffin (author of the Creature from Jekyll Island) has written an introduction that will spare me the embarrassment. I've included his introduction below. 

Additionally, for those who don't have the time to read the rough draft, I’ve reposted part of a video that I recorded in 2012 at the beginning of the project. Hopefully this will clear up any questions about the book’s topic and convey the importance of spreading this information far and wide.

http://youtu.be/eSfGpYWWG8s

Last but not least, I want to sincerely thank each and every one of you who invests their time and money into learning about (and resisting) corporate and state-sponsored crime. If not for people like you, the world would be a very ugly place. (All money contributed to this campaign will be used to cover final editing, design, inventory and marketing costs.)  

Introduction
by G. Edward Griffin

If you have ever watched an illusionist perform up-close magic, you know the power of misdirection and sleight-of-hand. Even in a room full of suspicious and attentive observers, the illusionist can fool them all. By exploiting known weaknesses in the human mind and employing his tools of the trade, he will deceive the crowd whether it wants to be deceived or not.

Imagine what an equally talented “network” of political illusionists can accomplish. Performing before an audience of mostly trusting and casual observers, exploiting known weaknesses in the human mind, and employing their tools of the trade, they, too, will deceive the crowd whether it wants to be deceived or not.

Having spent nearly sixty years of my life researching and writing about the illusionists who control our world, I can say without reservation that you are about to learn some of their closest-held secrets. Joe has done an outstanding job of weeding through Carroll Quigley’s book, Tragedy & Hope. He has captured the essence of what Quigley referred to as “the Network” and made this important information accessible to the average person who simply doesn’t have time to read a 1,300-page history book. Even for those who intend to read the entire volume, Joe has created an introduction and study guide that will serve the serious student well.

Knowledge of who Carroll Quigley was and the deceptions that he revealed is essential for understanding the real world of today. His close relationship with the Network and his approval of its aims made it possible to provide an insider’s analysis of the minds and methods of the global elite. Without this knowledge, the actions of those who dominate the U.S. government and the Western world do not make sense. With it, everything falls into place.

Be forewarned. The journey you are about to begin is not for the faint hearted. If you are comfortable with the illusions that currently pass for political reality, this book is not for you because, once you discover how the deceivers perform their magic, the comfort of ignorance is no longer possible. Once the bell is rung, it cannot be unrung.

The bell starts ringing on the next page.

story:
This campaign showcases a community of individuals from all walks of life that are drawn together by using the art of poetry and spoken word to facilitate change. Whether we use our words to create speeches for executives, poems to clear our heads, or to formulate the sentences that teach the impressionable minds of our future - our words are our voice - our legacies.

GotPoetry is a platform for creative minds of all ages, backgrounds and experience levels to use their voice and be heard. The independent community has offered active workshops, publishing resources, spoken word events and private assistance for over 14,000 global members for the last 15+ years. This campaign was created to help the community expand and flourish into the future, continuing our work with students and writers in more communities. We represent a movement of amateur writers, published authors, literary experts, students and poetry lovers that has struggled together to give as many people as possible a stronger voice and a fighting chance.

My name is Jo Anne-Patricia Piccarillo, I am a writer,  small business development specialist and entrepreneur from Long Island, NY, with a desire and passion for productive change. While I have always found ways to incorporate my writing into everything I do, it wasn't until nearly hitting rock bottom in 2008, when an entrepreneur hired me as an editor and indirectly motivated, teaching me to combine my lifelong passion and talent for writing, my business mind and SEO knowledge to become the change I wanted to see in the world. In 2010, I founded Scripted Ovations, a small business development service that maintains a stronger and more stable presence for small businesses and entrepreneurs in competitive markets, as well as the ability to network between each other for cost-effective production. The true Pay It Forward way.

On the verge of depression and for sheer personal gain, I joined the GotPoetry community and for the first time in years, my writing had a voice again. The energy and compassion amongst strangers, motivating each other to push towards their individual goals was inspiring. The fact that poetry is what brought all these individuals together still fascinates me all these years later. From the beginning days of transferring handwritten poems of poets around the world to the digital poetry database, GotPoetry has evolved to a level that unifies people through more than just poetry. It unifies us with a voice.

Throughout all of these years, knowing what the community has done for me, I never stopped to think that is was all made possible/operational because of one man - John Powers. Earlier this year, John announced his decision to close the community as it had outgrown both his expectations and his ability as just one person to take on. I watched a community of 14,000 members, myself included, fight tooth and nail to save their home - fundraising and donating and working together to take on the time and finances to keep the community running. Until I decided to get involved. To give back to the community that helped me rebuild and evolve as an individual and writer, with pride Scripted Ovations purchased the GotPoetry community to preserve its roots and expand its presence.

With the help of community members, educators, established literary organizations and local vendors, our mission is to provide creative individuals with resources and opportunities to express their art, showcase their work and strengthen their ability to make a living or a difference through their artistic talent.

Over the last few months, Scripted Ovations and GotPoetry members have proudly raised over $5,000 that has been used to perform much needed system upgrades within the community, as well as to establish the foundation of scheduled GotPoetry Live events. Our Poetry Slams, workshops and seminars encourage and educate individuals to use their voice to facilitate productive change. All proceeds of these events are replenished back into the community as needed like providing school supplies for local students, resources for authors and educational seminars that teach the importance of literature and language for individual growth.

All contributions from this campaign will be used for community security upgrades and enhancements such as:

  • Completion of upgrades to the online community portal such as server/content security upgrades, development updates to enhance member features and access, as well as the modified updates to the mobile site portal.
  • Implementation of new membership tier system which will enable a more customized experience for all members, a broader range of less expensive membership options that secures a self-sufficient community
  • Capital allowance to secure our Member Recognition Program which provides writing materials, school supplies, memberships and resource tools to students and writers across the world.
  • Secure/renew event locations for future events (Primarily the Winter Young Writers Workshops & Poetry Slams)
  • Printing of At  the End of the Tunnel - Printed compilation of featured GotPoetry artwork, poetry and literary works by members and staff.


Should we not reach our intended goal, all funds will be allocated solely and in equal parts to the first three items listed above.
    As in any community, the boy next door that you watched grow up could write the screenplay to the movie you rave about next year! The GotPoetry community offers opportunities and resources to ensure such creative talent has a place to join together and grow together. It is a place to find informational, educational and personal growth opportunities through workshops and webinars amongst a like-minded support team,

    Just as any community of our size, maintaining an effective and unified production system amongst such a widely spread member base poses a risk to success. With 17+ group forums running daily, 20+ monthly workshops and webinars, live weekly events, on top of active marketplaces, publishing series and weekly columns - maintaining communication with a global staff can leave global room for error. However, the potential joint-ventures that we are currently working on could expand our community by nearly 34,000 members upon contract signing- solidifying our presence throughout the United States and Australia even stronger.  

    Can't contribute but share our passion? Please help us by using your voice to help us save ours. The GotPoetry community was built and evolved thus far by word of mouth and we would be forever grateful if you could share our community, our mission and our goal with those who share the same passions!

story:
Short Summary

I Found Real Love is a memoir by Leah Seelman. This book explores real examples of God's love that Leah has experienced throughout her life and the lives of people around her. Each story connects the experience to a Scripture verse for the reader to look up and study. I Found Real Love  challenges the reader to find God's love in everyday experiences and give Him glory for what He's done, what He continues to do, and what He will do.

What We Need & What You Get

I Found Real Love is being published by JSA Publications, LLC which is a company designed to help authors self-publish their books. JSA does all the publishing work without taking royalties from the author. Unlike traditional publishing where the publisher pays for the production of the book and then takes royalties from the author, self-published books are funded by the author. This is where you come in. By ordering a copy of the book through this fundraiser, you're helping Leah pay for the printing of her book. The more funds raised, the more copies of the book can be printed and the quality of materials used in printing can be upgraded. Additionally, books ordered through this campaign will feature a poem written by Leah that will not be available in later printings. It's a win-win! Order your copy of I Found Real Love today or donate what you can to the general printing fund.

The Impact

It is Leah's hope and prayer that the reader of this book will discover real love as they move through the pages of these stories. The experience of writing and sharing this book will impact Leah too and will ultimately be one more story to add to her many wonderful life experiences.

Risks & Challenges

There are very limited risks with this campaign. At this point, the book is ready to be sent to the printer and will only take a few short days to process. Most of the challenges from this project came prior to this fundraiser. This is not only the first book that Leah has written, but it is also the first book that JSA Publications is publishing. Any problems that could arise, while highly unlikely, would come from an issue with the printing company such as printing on the wrong material or other such issues that sometimes, but rarely, happen with orders. In this case it would simply be a small delay in receiving the books while they are reprinted. There should not be any issue that arises that results in the book not getting printed, only delayed.

Other Ways You Can Help

Maybe this book isn't for you or maybe you just can't afford a copy right now. There are other ways to support Leah. For instance, by sharing this campaign on social media, you can increase the amount of people who have access to it. If you do get a copy of the book, writing reviews and word-of-mouth recommendations can go a long way to help support Leah and her book.

Campaign Goals

Meeting the following pre-order goals will allow for better quality materials to be used in the printing process. Goals that have not yet been unlocked will be listed in red while goals that have been met will be grey. Meeting all of the goals will ensure future editions will also be of the highest printed quality.

  • 50 pre-orders

​SUCCESSFUL CAMPAIGN

At this level, the campaign is considered successfully funded and this page will remain active to be able to continue to raise funds for future editions.

  • 100 pre-orders

​IDEAL CAMPAIGN

This is the ideal campaign level to maximize the printing process. Printed copies beyond 100 become more economical for both the author and the printer. This level also unlocks the limited hardback edition for the first 25 pre-orders to select that option.

  • 150 pre-orders

​EMBOSSED COVER

At this level the special editions become even more special. In addition to the extra poem printed in this edition, the paperback editions will also feature an embossed (textured) cover.

  • 200 pre-orders

​FOIL COVER

The special edition will get yet another upgrade at this level. The cover will now feature a foil (shiny) coating.

  • 250 pre-orders

​THICKER PAPER MATERIAL

At this level the page material used will be a thicker, more sturdy, quality and will help prolong the shelf life of the book.

  • 300 pre-orders

​HIGHER QUALITY PAPER MATERIAL

The page quality will be updated again to a higher quality and more standard book page.

  • 350 pre-orders

​THICKER COVER MATERIAL

At this level the cover material will now get an upgrade. The cover will be thicker to once again prolong the shelf life of the book.

  • 400 pre-orders

​The cover will receive a final upgrade at this level by receiving a matte coating. This coating is smooth to the touch and very appealing both visually and when held.

  • 450 pre-orders

​HIGHER QUALITY PAPER MATERIAL IN FUTURE EDITIONS

Reaching this level ensures that future editions of the book will have the upgraded page material that will be used in this edition.

  • 500 pre-orders

​HIGHER QUALITY COVER MATERIAL IN FUTURE EDITIONS

The final goal will ensure that the cover material used in this edition will also be used in future editions.

How to Order

To order, select which "perk" you would like from the provided list and proceed through the ordering process. If you would like to purchase an amount of books not shown, contact JSA Publications and the option will be added for you. If you have any issues or questions about how to order, please don't hesitate to contact JSA. There is a nifty "ask a question" button towards the top of the page or you can connect with JSA on facebook or by email at jessica@jsapublications(dot)com.
story_txt:
Short Summary
I Found Real Love is a memoir by Leah Seelman. This book explores real examples of God's love that Leah has experienced throughout her life and the lives of people around her. Each story connects the experience to a Scripture verse for the reader to look up and study. I Found Real Love  challenges the reader to find God's love in everyday experiences and give Him glory for what He's done, what He continues to do, and what He will do.

What We Need & What You Get
I Found Real Love is being published by JSA Publications, LLC which is a company designed to help authors self-publish their books. JSA does all the publishing work without taking royalties from the author. story:
This book shapes and forms the understanding of how faith and mental health cross paths, and it depicts this understanding through stories, songs, and more. I wrote it because I have personally dealt with generalized anxiety disorder, and my faith has played a huge role in this. I want to show people that they are never alone and that there is always help and an answer. My book will publish in February of 2020. 

Story of My Book

Every Rose Has Its Thorn- A Thorn in the Flesh details my own personal stories about my battle with anxiety and how God has poured into my life to rescue me from myself. This book serves as a reminder that these battles and struggles are no match for our God, and He can rescue and bring us through anything we deal with. 

My name is Sydney Radecki and I am the author of Every Rose Has Its Thorn- A Thorn in the Flesh. I wrote this book to end the stigma against mental health, and to show that you can be a Christian and suffer from mental disorders, while carrying your beliefs hand in hand. 

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover how mental health and faith have a connection, but also that God is here with you and He can ultimately solve your problems. In this book, I hope to instill the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for faith, healing, and mental health in you. And then, ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you fight through your hard times and trust that God is with you throughout all things. 

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover and find peace and know that you are not alone, and to discover the reality and truth of what suffering from a mental health disorder yet having a strong faith outlet truly looks like. In this book, I hope to instill the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for being there for others, providing people with hope during their lowest times, and the excitement of serving as an inspiration for others to trust God to fight their battles. I hope that you will learn how having your identity set and found in Christ will enable you to know He can fight and win your battle. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you break your chains, find your peace, and to know that you are much more than your struggle. 

In this book, you'll learn about the connection between faith and mental health. 
  • You’ll hear my personal testimony about my personal faith journey and how I was saved. 
  • You’ll hear tidbits and stories from many of my close friends who have shared about faith among many other things. 
  • You’ll hear from real doctors and mental health counselors on strategies to take on your personal mental health struggles, while keeping a positive attitude. 
You will love this book if you are seeking to find truth to your struggle, and to find a way out of your present day situation. I also believe you will love this book if you are a mental health advocate and strong in your faith as well. 
Every Rose Has Its Thorn- A Thorn in the Flesh is a non-fiction book that speaks to the advocates, Christians, and warriors who are looking at coping methods, comparisons, and stories for the first time. 

 

The Book -Every Rose Has Its Thorn— A Thorn in the Flesh 

The book is written in five parts... 

Part One contains the introduction + additional chapters. In this section readers will have the opportunity to learn more about my anxiety battle, and readers will begin to learn and see some insight about how God works in our lives even in the midst of these battles. 

Part Two contains Chapters 14-19. In these chapters, readers will be immersed into the glory and goodness of God, and they will learn more about the Word of God, and how it is important to utilize this and look to God in the midst of our hardships. 

Part Three contains Chapters 20-25. This part of the book contains detailed information on proven methods on how to cope with any mental health disorder. This section also provides lots of education in regards to mental health and the intersection of that and faith. 

Part Four contains Chapters 26-31. These chapters depict and detail some of the various hardships we go through, but it also ties directly back into the hope that follows with it. This section is formatted so readers will learn that it is okay to not be okay, but it is also extremely important to look to the Lord during these moments. 

Part 5 contains Chapters 32-37, and a closing letter. This final section aims to show readers my personal happy ending and resolution to my anxiety battle, by God’s grace. It also aims to show readers that they can get through anything they put their minds to, and that God will always see them through. 
 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

 

  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in February, 2020. 
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this winter. 

When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish. 
  • A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book
  • And more...

About the Author

Sydney Radecki is a current sophomore at Clemson University, studying Secondary Education Social Studies- History with a minor in Psychology. She aspires to teach high school social studies classes, and eventually become a guidance counselor. Sydney is a member of Sigma Alpha Omega, a Christian social sorority, at Clemson University, and loves to spread the Word with everyone around her. She is a firm believer that anyone can overcome any struggle thrown their way, and that the Lord is with them throughout. 

Sydney Radecki has always loved to write and has always dreamed of writing a book and of becoming a published author. Sydney heard about this opportunity through a Clemson University Facebook Group and she quickly became involved and seized the opportunity. Sydney has a drive to help and serve others who are going through difficult things in their lives and to show them how God has helped her through her own struggles, in order to find the intersections and to help the other not feel alone. Sydney has a passion for raising awareness to real life struggles that all humans, including Christians, suffer from and go through, no matter the magnitude of the struggle. 

Sydney grew up loving to dance, despite sometimes being clumsy. Sydney has a huge passion for dogs- any dog, any size, any color. She loves them all. 

For more information you can connect with Sydney at sydney.radecki9@gmail.com or on Instagram: @sydney_radecki 

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

 

  • Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #EveryRoseHasItsThornSR and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page
  • Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Sydney Radecki

story:
EDIT:

Zahvaljujući vama, objavili smo i ovu, treću epizodu!!!

HVALALALALALALA!

I dalje možete da kupite svoj primjerak, ovdje ili na trba-dugi.com

 

(The book is available in English, please read English text below)

TRBA I DUGI SU UPALI U NOVU AVANTURU!

Rezervišite svoj primjerak unaprijed i pomozite nam da odštampamo treću knjigu serijala.

 

Sjećate se naših Avantura?

Prve dvije slikovnice su objavljene uz pomoć naše publike i uz njih divno rastu djeca.

Uz prvu knjigu su izašle i igračke od papira, koje je kreirao čuveni Brajan Kastelfort iz Los Anđelesa, a obe su promovisane na veličanstvenim radionicama u Muzeju savremene umjetnosti Republike Srpske.

 

Treći nastavak je skoro pa završen.

Jelena je napisala novu priču. Jedna Milica radi na nevjerovatnim ilustracijama. Skoro je sve gotovo, a sad ste vi na redu!

 

O čemu se radi?

Trba, Dugi, Princeza i Zmaj, uvrnuta ekipa dobrodušnih junaka, srećno živi u Zmajevom zamku. Međutim, dešava se nešto neočekivano. Dugi je počeo da pati od nesanice. Doktor zec Vladimir mu je dao pogrešan lijekić, i Dugi, a s njim i Princeza i Trba su počeli nekontrolisano da se smanjuju. Hitno je, potreban im je protivlijek koji se nalazi u izgubljenoj svesci recepata doktora Vladimira, zeca koji odskora živi u Zamku,a sveska je negdje, na dnu ruševina jednog fakulteta. Da li će Zmaj uspjeti da pronađe svesku prije nego što Trba, Dugi i Princeza postanu nevidljivi golim okom? I od vas zavisi...

 

Šta zavisi od vas?

Troškovi štampe su veliki, a mi knjige pravimo zato što volimo i zato što vjerujemo da su i našoj i vašoj djeci potrebne savremene, domaće knjige koje ih uče da ne moraju da budu super heroji i misice, već dobri ljudi i iskreni prijatelji.

Od vas zavisi da li ćemo skupiti dovoljno novca za štampu. Desno imate detaljna upustva kako da naručite knjigu (knjige), igračke, majice ili postere.

Rezervišite što prije, pripazite na kom jeziku i pismu rezervišete knjigu i pratite nas. Pričajte prijateljima, dijelite na društvenim mrežama i navijajte za domaće autore koji vjeruju da mogu nemoguće: napraviti kvalitetan i čitan serijal dječjih, bogato ilustrovanih slikovnica, danas na Balkanu.

A sada, klik po svoju knjigu!

A za više informacija, posjetite www.trba-dugi.com/nasa-prica

 

ENGLISH!

TUBBY AND STRETCH HAVE A NEW ADVENTURE!

Please reserve your copy of the book and help us publish our third episode.

We already published two books from the series, with a lot of help from you, our readers. Books were followed by paper toys created by famous creator Brian Castleforte from Los Angeles. Both books had marvelous premieres at the Museum of Contemporary Arts of Republic Of Srpska.
We're almost done with this, the third one. Jelena and Milica have almost done the writing and illustrations. Now, it's your turn.

 

The Lost Book of Potions of Dr Rabbit

Tubby, Stretch, Princess and Dragon are living happily ever after in the castle. However, one night, Stretch has insomnia. Rabbit doctor Vladimir gives him a wrong medicine, so Stretch starts shrinking, together with Tubby and the Princess who also tried the potion.They urgently need an antidote, but Vladimir can't remember it. The solution is under the ruins of his old Wizzard Academy, where he lost his book of potions. Will the Dragon find the book of potions before the others shrink to atoms?


It also depends on you!

Pledge your copies in advance, in English, Cyrillic, Latin ...spread the word, share on social networks.
Be part of the story of Tubby and Stretch. Spread the word. If you are not able to pledge at the moment, share our story on social networks, that means a lot to us, we want our book in right hands.

You have decided to support us?

GREAT! When you pledge, pay attention to the language, which version you are taking. Also, for all countries except Bosnia and Herzegovina there is additional shipping cost. Minimal, but there is one.

HVALALALALALALA!
I dalje možete da kupite svoj primjerak, ovdje ili na trba-dugi.com
 
(The book is available in English, please read English text below)
TRBA I DUGI SU UPALI U NOVU AVANTURU!
Rezervišite svoj primjerak unaprijed i pomozite nam da odštampamo treću knjigu serijala.

 
Sjećate se naših Avantura?
Prve dvije slikovnice su objavljene uz pomoć naše publike i uz njih divno rastu djeca.
Uz prvu knjigu su izašle i igračke od papira, koje je kreirao čuveni Brajan Kastelfort iz Los Anđelesa, a obe su promovisane na veličanstvenim radionicama u Muzeju savremene umjetnosti Republike Srpske.
 
Treći nastavak je skoro pa završen.
Jelena je napisala novu priču. Jedna Milica radi na nevjerovatnim ilustracijama. Skoro je sve gotovo, a sad ste vi na redu!

 
O čemu se radi?
Trba, Dugi, Princeza i Zmaj, uvrnuta ekipa dobrodušnih junaka, srećno živi u Zmajevom zamku. Međutim, dešava se nešto neočekivano. Dugi je počeo da pati od nesanice. Doktor zec Vladimir mu je dao pogrešan lijekić, i Dugi, a s njim i Princeza i Trba su počeli nekontrolisano da se smanjuju. Hitno je, potreban im je protivlijek koji se nalazi u izgubljenoj svesci recepata doktora Vladimira, zeca koji odskora živi u Zamku,a sveska je negdje, na dnu ruševina jednog fakulteta. Da li će Zmaj uspjeti da pronađe svesku prije nego što Trba, Dugi i Princeza postanu nevidljivi golim okom? I od vas zavisi...

 
Šta zavisi od vas?
Troškovi štampe su veliki, a mi knjige pravimo zato što volimo i zato što vjerujemo da su i našoj i vašoj djeci potrebne savremene, domaće knjige koje ih uče da ne moraju da budu super heroji i misice, već dobri ljudi i iskreni prijatelji.
Od vas zavisi da li ćemo skupiti dovoljno novca za štampu. Desno imate detaljna upustva kako da naručite knjigu (knjige), igračke, majice ili postere.

Rezervišite što prije, pripazite na kom jeziku i pismu rezervišete knjigu i pratite nas. Pričajte prijateljima, dijelite na društvenim mrežama i navijajte za domaće autore koji vjeruju da mogu nemoguće: napraviti kvalitetan i čitan serijal dječjih, bogato ilustrovanih slikovnica, danas na Balkanu.
A sada, klik po svoju knjigu!
A za više informacija, posjetite www.trba-dugi.com/nasa-prica
 
ENGLISH!
TUBBY AND STRETCH HAVE A NEW ADVENTURE!

Please reserve your copy of the book and help us publish our third episode.
We already published two books from the series, with a lot of help from you, our readers. Books were followed by paper toys created by famous creator Brian Castleforte from Los Angeles. Both books had marvelous premieres at the Museum of Contemporary Arts of Republic Of Srpska.We're almost done with this, the third one. Jelena and Milica have almost done the writing and illustrations. Now, it's your turn.
 

The Lost Book of Potions of Dr Rabbit
Tubby, Stretch, Princess and Dragon are living happily ever after in the castle. However, one night, Stretch has insomnia. Rabbit doctor Vladimir gives him a wrong medicine, so Stretch starts shrinking, together with Tubby and the Princess who also tried the potion.They urgently need an antidote, but Vladimir can't remember it. The solution is under the ruins of his old Wizzard Academy, where he lost his book of potions. Will the Dragon find the book of potions before the others shrink to atoms?

It also depends on you!
Pledge your copies in advance, in English, Cyrillic, Latin ...spread the word, share on social networks.Be part of the story of Tubby and Stretch. Spread the word. If you are not able to pledge at the moment, share our story on social networks, that means a lot to us, we want our book in right hands.

You have decided to support us?
GREAT! When you pledge, pay attention to the language, which version you are taking. Also, for all countries except Bosnia and Herzegovina there is additional shipping cost. Minimal, but there is one.

story:
Hello Fellow Pan Africans,

For those of you who have not received any mail piece from me before, let me introduce myself:

I am Kwadwo Obeng, the author of the book “WE Are All Africans – Exposing the Negative Influence of the Judeo-Christian-Islamic Religions on Africans”.

 

It is on weareallafricans.com, Amazon and Barnes and Nobles with excellent reviews. I am an activist promoting African renaissance and consciousness. My passion is the unity of the African families on the continent and the Diaspora, and, the integration of the 54 African colonies (countries) into one country with one Government for all Africa and the Countries of the Caribbean. My work involves establishing a new African Paradigm Shift by re-educating Africans on their real origin and history of Africa dating back to millions of years, appreciating our cultures, religions and traditions based on human values.

African people have been transformed into Europeans, Arabs and Jews by mis-education by Europeans, Arabs, and Jews using their powerful tools of their religions – Judaism, Christianity and Islam. We have been de-Africanized.

The book analyzes the teachings of these bogus religions that have been craftily packaged and promoted as ‘True’ religions for Africans. It debunks the Jewish and Arabic creation stories, Noah's global flood and so many others as myths that are no more valid than other creation stories told by other cultures, including African. It shows Jesus, Mohammed and Moses as not prophets of the world but political tyrants and violent terrorists who used their religions for control of the world including Africa. (Jesus’ own words reveal him as would-be terrorist too, if he ever returns). These men are not to be adored as prophets or saviors of African people. History and reality shows them as terrorists whose teachings have been responsible for the genocide of millions of African people during the past 2,000 years.

Please donate to the cause

Using anthropology, paleontology, mitochondrial DNA, Y-Chromosomes, fossil record, and the history of our ancestors in the Nile Valley, it shows us that Africans are not and could not be the descendants of Adam who was created in Iraq (Mesopotamia) only 6,000 years ago according to biblical chronology.

Rather, African ancestors have been on the continent for millions of years as hominins/hominids, and as homo sapiens and homo sapien sapien (modern humans) during the past 200,000 years according to Dr. Spencer Wells. The bones of Dinkenesh (“Lucy”), a lady found in Ethiopia, have been dated by radiometric dating to 3.2 million years old.

State of Pan Africa

These religions have had tremendous influence on the world. For people of African descent, it has been disastrous – over 200 million either murdered or enslaved by Arabs, Jews, Americans, Europeans and Hindi Brahmins. Our lives have no value to them as evidenced by victims such as Emett Til, Trayvon Martin, Dr. King and so many others.

These people refuse to hear anything about reparations for harm caused African people.

African people have been coerced into accepting these religions as their culture and religions, and rejecting those of their ancestors. We have been branded as an inferior race only good to be slaves by these religions. This negative branding is still found in their so-called holy books – Torah, Talmud, Bible, Catechisms, Koran, Hadiths, and taught to their children, worst of all, our children.

We have been divided along lines of ‘race’ (near-white-skinned, light-skinned, in-between-skinned vs. black-skinned), religions of others, thus, creating terrible disunity among us. We have no respect or trust in each other.

Africans are killing each other in Nigeria, Somalia, Uganda, Tanzania, Ivory Coast over political ideologies, religion with European, Jewish and Arab involvement.

Our continent was partitioned and shared between European countries. Our quasi-governments backed by Americans and Europeans continue to operate within the boundaries of colonial territories since independence without any intentions of uniting us. These puppet politicians of these colonies pay lip-service of unity while promoting disunity with bogus organizations like Africa Union and Economic Communities.

We have developed strong nationalistic attachment to these colonial territories. So we are patriotic Ghanaians, Nigerians, South Africans, Ugandans, Kenyans…The divide and conquer has worked well for the Europeans and their supporters, including the newcomer, China, but against us. The truth is: we are not better off than we were 50 years ago.

Today, African people are at the bottom of society's social and economic ladder wherever we are. Our family is the most fragmented and disintegrated of all cultural groups due to the fact that we have rejected our African culture, traditions and religions that taught human values of familial love, unity, kindness, empathy, respect for life - human as well as animals, and, respect for elders, ancestors and authority. Present-day Africans are Africans only by skin color and place of birth. Sadly, the overwhelming majority thinks and aspires to be European, Jewish or Arabic.

We are a lost people who need to return to our roots – culture, religions, and learn our rich history. We are of Africa but Africa is not in us.

Loss of Natural Resources, Animals and Land

Our natural resources and ancestral farming lands are being depleted or sold to greedy corporations and investors in several African countries – Sierra Leone, Kenya, Ethiopia, Mozambique to name a few. Usually, indigenous Africans who have farmed the land, ancestral heritage, are forcibly moved to unsuitable land without compensation. The Afrikaans did that in South Africa; now misguided African politicians are implementing this wicked policy on Africans.

The industrialized world, including China, has a voracious appetite for Africa’s resources. We are obscenely exploited by outsiders, and our most corrupt politicians are collaborators in the exploitation for their self-enrichment. Africa’s animals are on the extinct list due to barbaric hunting and killing for sport or aphrodisiac purposes by Europeans, Arabs and Chinese.

Soon there will be nothing left for Africans and the generations to come. Then what? Extermination!

Time for a Revolutionary Change - Take Back Africa!

African people talk, moan and groan about our situation. We spend a lot of our time praying to Jesus or Allah to come and save us from the guns and swords, poisons in the hands of the people who brought us Jesus, Allah and Yahweh without taking action ourselves. We have become too passive, too afraid, always waiting for the 'white' man’s solution to problems they cause us. We rely on the UN, a white man’s organization for control of the world. They have used tactics such as assassination of our honest leaders – Lumumba, Khadafy, Sankara, and deposing of Pan African leaders like Osagyefo Kwame Nkrumah to stop unification and integration efforts.

 

Education as Key  

We know everything about anybody except us. Now is the time to know who we really are and what we need to do about ourselves and for ourselves.

The impact of the book and what your contribution can accomplish

Two years ago we engaged in an educational program of a series of lectures based on the book. Unfortunately it was suspended. We would like to start again. The program covers the following:

  • re-education of African people to un-learn what was taught to us and then learn the truths about ourselves
  • taking ownership of the continent from absolutely corrupt, power-hungry, murderous politicians who think they rule by divine power
  • undoing the mental harm done with these religions by eliminating Judaism, Christianity, Islam and Hinduism from Africa
  • integrating Africa back into one piece by erasing the colonial borders drawn around us by the Europeans at the Berlin conference
  • killing the African Union – a European organization to perpetuate disintegration, and setting up one continental government – Africa Republic – for all Africa and the Caribbean

With unification and integration, we can solve the problems of the entire continent in an integrated fashion, rather than piecemeal, country by country (colony by colony). Integration will put Africa on a fast track, developing it into an economic, military and cultural superpower for the betterment of ALL African people regardless of their place of birth place of residence.

We can take control of our resources, unite all the family groups (tribes) to live side-by-side in peace as our ancestors did more than 200,000 years ago, and stand on our own feet without depending on the ‘international community’ of exploiters. No more war-lords creating mayhem on women and children on the continent. We can develop trans-continental infrastructure that can enable intra-continental and international trade and commerce with one economy. We can stop internecine wars, eliminate starvation and poverty. No African should go to bed on an empty stomach.

Time to Dream Big!

This may sound like a dream, but dreams acted upon by diligent people, become reality. With the aid of technology, this generation of Pan Africans can and should make this unified integration happen for the sake of our children and our ‘race’. Africa is broken; we are the only ones who can fix it.

If you don’t believe in dreams, then you have not heard of Honorable Marcus Garvey, Dr. Martin Luther-King or Osagyefo Dr. Kwame Nkrumah:

Honorable Marcus Garvey - "Back to Africa Movement." Let’s make Africa home for Marcus!

Osagyefo Dr. Kwame Nkrumah - “Africa Must Unite!” - So let’s make it happen!

Dr. Martin Luther-King - “I Have a Dream” - Help make Martins's dream come true!

 

Ways You Can Help

We need to disseminate this information on various media platforms and languages for Pan Africa in different countries and languages. We need your help. The more we recieve, the more we can do.

 

$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$

Please donate contributions for these educational projects:

1. Audio/video of the book “We are all Africans – Exposing the Negative Influence of the Judeo-Christian-Islamic Regions of Africans” on DVDs, CDs, and downloadable digital products. (we don’t read anymore, we like to watch)

2. Print three-part volumes of the original 785-page book.

3. Produce a community newspaper to contain excerpts of the book, articles on unification and NEWS from Pan Africa. (This paper will be distributed in major cities across the United States with a digital version online)

4. Produce smaller books and booklets based on subjects of interest to our family.

5. Teach African history - from human origin, empires and civilization, world migrations, current status and future possibilities.

6. Vigorously promote one continental government for Africa and the Caribbean in different media plaforms.

Future Project

7. Produce a movie based on the life of Osagyefo Dr. Kwame Nkrumah – Africa's foremost champion of unification.

 

The Team

We have a team of writers, newspaper producers, editors, authors, educators and videographers ready to go.

Even if you are not in a position to contribute to this project you can talk to your acquaintances, friends and family members who may be interested.

Please forward this email to all on your list, without prejudging and excluding anyone. Tell your friends, family members, even the children about it. Forward it to university students you know in Africa, Europe, United States, and Caribbean.

Let’s take ownership of Africa NOW!

Are you fed up yet?

Now is the time to stand up and take action. No more talk. Talk is cheap!

It is time to mobilize and take back Our Continent!

If Africa and African people are of interest to you then donate. Let's put our money where our big mouths are.

This cannot be defferred to future generations who will not have enough resources to effect change. All the resources would have been extracted to America, Europe, China, India, Brazil, Arabia... Africa would never be developed.

Be the change you want to see in Africa for the survival of our race and our children! 

Contribute whatever you can now to help unify our people.

YOU can stop the exploitation, rape and abuse of Africa! 

 

A strong Africa can stand up for her children wherever they live in the world.

This is our century. We can do it together.

Thank you in advance for your support.

See below for perks we will send you as our appreciation for your contribution.

See the book on Amazon

Read book reviews here 

Clik here to see more perks you can choose from.

Additional Perks at this link

 

Africa for Africans Forever!
